1512211221111222.content:
“We’re headed to shop next.” You almost immediately feel less psyched than you had a moment ago. The thought of being around all of that large potentially dangerous equipment does not seem like it would be too good for your health. Zen does not look the least bit worried and you hope that he has taken into consideration how dangerous such a workplace could be for you.

You can tell you are approaching the shop class well before you reach it. The smell of sawdust permeates the hallway a good distance from the actual door to the class. You and Zen are the first students to arrive in the class and you are pleased to see that you have a ferret for a teacher. His name, Mr. Kodo, has already written on a board in the classroom. He notices Zen walk in almost immediately with you riding in on his shoulder. “Ah, Zen you’re the first one here and I see you’ve brought our special student with you.”

“I’m very interested in seeing what you are capable of doing human. They say those little hands of yours are capable of performing miracles in the shop, not like these unwieldy paw like things we anthros have,” he said while extending one clawed finger to you for you to shake. As you shook the large digit another student arrived and you are pleasantly surprised to be greeted by Felicia. She smiles sweetly at you before saying hello to Zen and Mr. Kodo. The other two students are an iguana and a raccoon that you do not know, but the last student was one you were not looking forward to seeing in this type of class. It looked like Corneil was going to be in shop class with you.

Having the large rhino in a class with you where there are so many ways that you could suffer a little accident was frightening. Zen and Felicia must have been thinking the same thing because their eyes narrowed at the sight of him. “We’ll keep him away from you,” Felicia said silently to you and Zen nodded in affirmation to what she said. It was a little comforting knowing that the two large felines would be looking after you, but you still could not help but worry. They could not look after you all the time.

The first day of shop class did not prove to be much of a problem for you though. It mostly consisted of Mr. Kodo giving everyone a tour of the classroom and introducing them to the equipment. Of course, you had your own special workstation that included brand new equipment which Corneil did not seem to approve of by the way he snorted when he heard that. After the tour Mr. Kodo had to make sure everyone passed a safety test and that pretty much took up the entire class. You easily passed as did Felicia and Zen, but Corneil seemed to have a bit of trouble. That actually worried you a bit more since not only did you have to worry about a giant rhino with a grudge against you, but you had to worry about a clumsy giant rhino with a grudge against you. This was sure going to be an interesting class.

When the bell rang to signal the end of the class and the beginning of the lunch period Zen moved to get you out of the class well before Corneil could. He would not be happy after you had managed to pass that test with ease and he barely managed to pass. Felicia slowed Zen down a bit when she asked, “Can I carry the human this time?”

Zen looked at you and you said, “Sure, why not?”

Felicia’s eyes seemed to brighten up and she reached out to you but did not grab you. She was being polite and letting you step into her paw instead of just grabbing you. When you did she carefully placed you on her shoulder which was noticeably smaller than Zen’s and that made you feel a little worried about falling. She noticed that and grew herself a couple of extra feet to give you a more comfortable perch. Then you were off to lunch.

You haven't been brought up because the teacher noticed you unconcious in my hands after they went to the principal's."

This is to much for you to hear. That ------- Corneil was the biggest pain in the history of the world. Felicia nears the Principal's Office and you see Zen sitting out side. You struggle to yell his name and he looks up. There is a mixture of anger, worry, and relief in his face. "What's going on," Felicia exclaims. Zen looks down and says...

You and Zen enter, with Felicia carrying you, and you see the principal, who is a well groomed Silver-Backed Gorilla. "So tell me ________, what happened really?" You gather yourself up and recall the events all the way back from your "first encounter". "You see its like thing..." you start, " During a rough get go in PE Felicia and Zen take me over to the treadmill and let me go at a pace that i can manage. Then Corneil comes by and "helps" me by sppeding up the treadmill and fillinging me off. Thanfully," you look to Felicia, " Felicia was able to catch me before i came to any real harm."

The Gorilla bows his head and does the continue motion with his fingers, taking in every word you say. Clearing your throught you continue," After that i was able to avoid Corneil until Mathimatics when he showed up in there as well. We had a shooting match so to speak, going back and fourth answering questions waiting for the other to slip up. This was my fault." The gorilla raises an eyebrow to this but stays silent. "I didn't listen to Zen about staying low and not bothering/angering Corneil about the possiblity that I am smarter than him."

You take a short sigh but continue the story."Next on the was out Corneil had grown larger and jumped me and Zen, strangling him and nearly flinging me from his mane, and threatened that unless i stayed out of the way i'd regret it. He also gave this short decleration/speech about how anthros are better than humans at everything and that i should stay away. Next was shop... but apart from some dirty looks nothing happened all that much..."

You stuggle to continue, partly from nervousness, partly because that spit wad must have blanked part of your memory. You look to Felicia and polietly ask, " Please fill in what i miss, my memory's not doing so well this close to the incident." Felicia agrees and you notice out of the corner of you eye that Zen is clenching his paws. "...then we went to English and Corneil sat behind me and Zen. Then.... uhhh.. then....-" "Then Corneil threw a paper airplane at ________, knocking him off the desk and i quickly caught him while Zen caught the note." "it had this small 3 sentence warning about how he'd make mylife living hell if I answered anything in this class."

Zen promptly walks up and give the Gorilla the note for him to examin. "...Felicia i cant really remember any more." She straitens up and continues the overview, " The teacher asked for the class to anser the grammer mistakes but no one did. Reluctently ____ went up to do it. Corneil started shooting spit wads at us. Thankfully none hit him at first.... Then a particularly large one smashed into him and i once again caught him."

"What of your injuries?" inquiors the Gorilla. "The nurse says he has a 3 part fracture in his left arm, 2 broken ribs, a concusion, and a shattered forearm and 4 broken fingers." You contemplate the extent of your injuries and grimace. "Thats all we can tell you sir."
The Gorila looks at Zen, "Anddo you have anything to add?" Zen shakes his head and replies, " No. Only that the two times i confrunted Corneil it was in his defence and that hi did infact jump us at a larger hight." The Gorilla stops him and sighs, "very well i see i have no choice but to expel Corneil, in truth this is his 2nd school he will have been removed from. It seems he was expelled for torturing a neighbooring human town and was thusly removed." "you are free to go."

You all leave the room before exclaiming a sigh of victory, no doubt there would be other herbivores who would take rash actions but Corneil was no longer one of them.

"Lets..."
15122112211112222112.title: Getting things strait(part 2)

151221122111122221122.content:
“Hey, let me make at least try and start making this up to you human,” said Zen.

“That’s alright, it wasn’t your fault Zen,” you responded. You noticed Felicia’s ears dip in shame and you said, “And it isn’t your fault either Felicia.”

“Yes it is, the first time I hold you for any length of time I just let somebody nail you hard enough to put you in a cast. I should have at least grown large enough to shield you from incoming objects,” said Felicia.

“And I should have confronted Corneil before disaster struck, not after you were nearly killed,” said Zen.

“Neither of you were the ones that did it and that’s all that matters. I’m fine, sort of, and Corneil is going to be expelled,” you said, trying to make your two protectors feel a little better about themselves. They did give each other a questioning look after you mentioned that Corneil was going to be expelled.

“I would not count on Corneil really getting expelled human,” said Felicia.

“Corneil’s father just became the superintendent last year and he will probably be able to convince the principle to change his mind about Corneil,” explained Zen. “We’re probably going to have to find a way of dealing with him ourselves. He’s probably not going to be too happy, either, if his father has to bail him out of trouble. Corneil might just get the rest of his friends involved in tormenting you now. Felicia and I are probably going to have to make sure that we pay close attention to your well being. We might have to get the rest of our friends to help out too.”

That was definitely something to think about. Then Felicia said, “It might not be such a good idea for me to keep you for the entire time you’re recovering. If Corneil always knows where you are he will definitely arrange for things to happen to you off school grounds. It might be best if we swapped where you stayed every few days.”

“That sounds like a good idea,” said Zen as he suddenly smiled at you. “I know I would like to have you stay with me a few days and we have a few friends that would like to get to know you. It would also be a nice way to show you that there are a lot of anthros that don’t hate humans.”

“A few of us would like help with our homework too,” Felicia laughed.

You joined in with her laughter. It probably would be best to make as friends as possible here. If Corneil and the other herbivores were going to be a continued problem you were going to need more than just Zen and Felicia to protect you.

“Since you missed the rest of the school day thanks to us, how about we take you out to eat? We’ll pay,” said Zen.

As Felicia holds you up against the movie rack for you to pick one, you realize that most of the movies are human ones but the disc is bigger. You finally ask to watch "8 legged freaks" (giant spider attack), but see the worried face of Zen
"Are you sure? You didn't like the size changing" he asks
"Naw I've seen it before. It's actually pretty funny when they are killing all the..." you pause "Oh my god! I was so inconsiderate! I was saying that it was funny when the killed the giant spiders, but then i realized there was a parallel: anthros. I'm so sorry..." your cut off as Felicia starts to pat your head with a paw.
"It's okay that could have happened to anyone. I've seen it too and I almost said 'It's so funny to see the humans expressions before they die" you all shudder realizing that this was not a great movie to watch.
"How about 'Ghost rider'? I haven't seen it yet but my mom says it's good" Zen says
"Oh I love Nicholas Cage!" squeals Felicia
"Me too" you agree
You all start to watch Ghost Rider when...
15122112211112222112211.title: You wake up in the caf'e

1512211221111222211222.content:
Just when you are about to respond to Zen's offer Felicia cuts in, " Zen I know you mean well but look at his condition, considering this happened a few hours ago, I think he needs some rest. " Zen looked you over then agreed. "Ok, for the next 3 days you'll be with Felicia then you'll stay with me ok?" You think it over and play out the situation so far. "Sure, thats fine with me." Felicia gently cupps you in her hand and presses it gently into her stomach so you dont slide around but wont get crshed as she jogs home. " See ya Zen" Then she takes off in the opposite direction that Zen heads to get home.

Being carfeul not to put any huge pains or strains on you broken body she joggs every five minutes at walks for a while to let the pain ease off. The overall trip only takes 20 minutes and Felicia uses her other hand to open the door. " I'm home," she calls where its not a yell that would hurt your ears but loud enough to make your ears ring. Felicia's parents are in the kitchen reading magazines and look up to great you two. Her mom, about the same height as Felicia, gets up and comes over to greet you. You shake the profered claw and she nods her head in greeting. Felicia's father is over by then and clearly much taller, about 21/2 heads, than Felicia and her mother. "So your _________, nice to meet you," you take his claw and shake it as well. Felicia then moves out of the kitchen and heads up the stairs when a blur of fur collides with her and your world suddenly flips......

You go end over end when you feel Fellicia's paw close around you to the point where, with some pain >.<, you stop moving and are safe again. "Calico!" Felicia shouts in anger and snatching her younger brother by the scruff of the neck she carries you both into her room, shutting the door behind her. She practically throw her brother onto her bed and then systematically checks to see if your injured, more then you already are. Once this is confirmed that, while you ache again, your fine she turns her attention on her brother who is shifting restlessly on the bed.

"What the hell were you doing!? You almost killed _________!" Her brother winces and turns his ears away from his sister's shouting and looks down at the floor. But when she metions your name his ears pivk up a little and he looks up, his dark green cat eyes staring at you, he starts to speak. "Y-y-you mean he's staying with us right now and i just..." he stops before he finishes that statement. "Im sorry Felicia, i didn't know, I-" "don't appologise to me he's the one you should apologise to." He once again looks at you and says again, " I'm sorry about that, i had no idea you were there." You shrug and rely, " Hey you didn't know and im not in any worse condition, no problem."

Felicia's brother looks slightly amazed at your i dont really care relpy but keeps the look from his face."Thanks man, my name is Calico if you haven't figured that out yet. You shake his claw as well, " Nice to meet you Calico." he hurriedly leaves the room so its only you and Felicia. She sighs and sets down her bag, 'funny,' you think , 'i never noticed that before', and takes out some textbooks. "Your classes gave out homework?" you query. Felicia frowns and responds," yes my teachers love to give out homework on the first day." You look at the assignments from her shoulder, "You want me to help you?" Her face lights up with gratitude, "Yes. Thanks."

You slowly go over her math work with her, using her shoulder to see the work over head and using verbal guides to solve the problems. By the end, apart from a rare hint from you, she is completing the problems on her own. She slams the book shut with a grin and the gust from the book causes you to lose you balace for a second before you catch yourself. Meanwhile she is taking out he science work and you recognize it as basic chemistry of gases and continue helping her. Once again by the end she can, for the most part, do the problems on her own and she finishes off giving a slight press into her neck like a very gentle hug. She then packs up her things and goes to rest on her bed while you are cupped in her hands resting on her stomach. Her steady breathing and warm furr slowly makes you drowsy and you fall asleep.
1512211221111222211222.title: Meeting the family

15122112211112222112221.content:
Felicia's paw gently nudges you awake to a twilight lit room and you manage to sit up. "You were sleeping so softly i didn't have the heart to wake you yesterday after what you went through." Felicia sets you on her bedside table does a very cat like streatch. You notice her clothes are different so she got dressed the woke you up after being sure that you had enough sleep. She has been watching over you like a mother cat over her young kitten. She comes over and picks you up to set onto her should again and heads down stairs. She quickly grabs a breakfeast/energy bar and heads out the door into the brisk morning air. She gives you a small piece witch you devoure due to your lack of food yesterday and the piece actually fills you up once you consume all of it.

You both arive to school and its still to dark for school to start but you notice Zen and some others hanging in a group. Felicia joggs up to them and you greet them all, theres:
Albert, the crocodile, Theodore, the kodak bear, Claude, the wolverine, and the vixen from math class. Zen greets both of you and fills you in, " Me and Felicia have been talking and we got you all together for one reason, to protect ________. It may come to your attentions that Corneil has been expelled but with his father as the super intendent he will be back and that grudge is going to be much worse. The pricipal agreed to this club ive formed and what we will be doing and has informed the teachers that this is allowed." He turns back and faces you. " ___________, we are your guardians for your life her at school, first Felicia, then Albert, then Claude, then Theodore, then Verena-" 'that must be the vixen,' you think as Zen continues," and finally me. We rotate every week and if needed we will switch to rotation in order in insure Corneil NEVER catches on with who you'll be with." Felicial steps forword and speaks, "What about confuntations with Corneil? If he actually takes action and we are alone." Zen thinks for a second then continues, " Then we have the protect him at all costs, Felicia you can sive change a given body part faster than anyone at the school you'll have an edge Corneil cant counter, since you are the only one who can do that and regular size chage. I can reach large heights as fast as you can do one given body part and i can get relativly bigger then corneil." pointing at his three friends, "You three can hold a fight as well as I and some of you are slightly stronger or have an advantage. Then there is Verena, the most special of us all." You have a questionative look on your face and Verena sees this and explains, " I am the only known Anthro that can both size change to a larger size or shrink to a smaller one. Which means if Corneil corners us i can get to a small size where he cant capture me and i can out run him." This was amazing, you are so amazed it shows through your face and everyone smiles at your shock.

Zen speaks up again," OK, we know our roles now lets get to our classes. Good luke Felicia." You all say your goodbyes and head to different classes.
15122112211112222112221.title: Forming the Club

choices: The week flys by and Corneil is absent
Half way through and Corneil is back
151221122111122221122211.content:
Instead of size changing class first Felicia heads to mathimatics, you note there is only one herbivore and she gives you a particularly nasty look. Felicia sets you on the desk and has a seat, the herbivore is the farthest possible away from you which allows you to relax a bit. The teacher, a sliver vixen, enters the class and she smiles and acknowledges you as one of the class, you see claude is also in this class and he has her peripheral on you two to make sure things are ok. This time you let many others and Felicia answer the questions, but answering the really difficult ones that no one dared try to answer. The class ends and Felicia heads to PE, and you have a slightly un easy feeling in your gut.

Felicia meets up with Zen and they do their work out, the same as yesterday, and you stay a good distance away until its time for cardio work independintly. Felicia picks you up and sets you on the tray on the treadmill and she gets on and does her endurence run, you still cant get over its 36 miles an hour, and Zen is, once again, doing high resistence on the cycles. "See you two at lunch with the others," with this Zen leaves while both of you head to third period.

Its sive changing and you anf Felicia are greeted by the teacher and Verena. Suddenly Verena recedes from your view and you feel Felicia bend over and set something next to you in her paw. Its Verena, who is still a good 3 feet taller than you. " Hey there, hows it going?" you greet her ackwardly. She smiles and responds, "Fine, and you?" she sees your casts and looks like she just said some racial slur. "It's ok, it doesnt really hurt anymore. So you can change size in both directions?" Her face beams and she responds, " yes it was a gift i discovered last year when we played hide and seek. Zen and Felicia gave up when i decided to grow to normal hight, revealing i was hidding behind a sigh post." You look amazed and she smiles. "You very good at math as well." You're happy for a subject change and reply, " It snot that im good its just that i've" you slow down trying to word it right, " I'm not saying your not smart but... well... ive taken that math class a long time ago." The vixen shrugs, " dont appologise we knew you were far more inteligent in such subjects and it not offensive, I'm glad you beat Corneil and put him in a rough spot." you think about how corneil was, supposidly the best but you easily matched him without even trying while he had to pause on some of them to rethink the answer. "Hey why do you still take size change classes if you can already do it?" The vixen replies withlittle thought, " we practice to better control the rate at which we size change and become faster at it." 'that explains alot' you say in your head. The teacher blows his whistle and Felicia's paw gently sets down Verena and Felicia continues to her next class.


Her elective is Computer Programing, also known as Computer Science, instead of art like Zen's. The teacher is a wise looking Giant Panda with a pair of glasses which showed the shimming knowledge and wisdom in his eyes behind them. You remeber takeing a course or two of this as well and wonder if it will be any different from those. "Hello class," which is followed imediatly by a responce of "Hellow Mr. Bing." At this, to your horror, this entire class, appart from Felicia, is filled with Herbivores. Some are even from your PE who hung out with Corneil. The teacher speaks again as you try to judge whether or not the teacher is friendly or one of those that wishes you weren't here, "We have a human in our class for a while but try not to focus on him or you may forget the lesson." It hits you like a blow to be treated like an object rather than a student as well.

Her next class is Science and the teacher, Water Buffalo, ignors you as well so you give Felicia the answers she doesn't know to respond to the teacher so you can feel some acomplishment. This class was balanced with Herbivores and Carnivores and you see Albert and Theodore in this clas as well, one sitting in from and on to your right. The bell rings signalling lunch and the four of you head out at the same time. It's first lunch and while the others of your club have live cows, you eat a piece of an energy bar Felicia had so you didnt have to think about the cows.

History proceeds without a problem as well as Shop. In shop you did you first small project and, even though it was still not as good as you wanted you made a particullarly craftful chinese puzzle, with working joints in the apropriate hinges and everything, and during second lunch you let Verena and some of the others try it out, you knew the way to do it since you built it, Verena completed it the fastest while many of the other sat puzzle trying to understand the pattern. Finally English came and went without any difficulties and you once again went home with Felicia and started to help her with her home work and hang out. You note that by the end of the day, besides the casts, it felt almost like a normal day. You go to sleep early again earger for the next day of school.
151221122111122221122211.title: Felicia has a different class schedual.

1512211221111222211222112.content:
"How could this happen,' you think, you were amazed how quickly the week has been while Corneil is gone, appart from some shunning durring in PE and Computer Science, and were glad to have time to heal without so much stress. Today was as good as it could get and everything suddenly smashed into a ----en wall and went spiralling down and hit a spicky blood covered pit with no way out. 'How could it happen to me?" was all you thought as you lay mangled on the floor awaiting for that final push to send you over the edge. You think back to earlier that day.......

"hey Felicia lets hurry to PE and catch up with Zen," you call to your anthro friend and she agrees, " hang on i'm going a little faster now." You clutch a scruff of her spotted fur within her neck hollow where, you found out, you can sit easily and not obstruct Felicia when she wants to run faster. The wind starts to rush past you giving you that exhilerated feeling like you were, almost, flying. Felicia slows down as she reaches the door and you both catch your breath and feel you heart skip a few beats and mabey even stop for a second or to. Corneil is talking with the PE teach, CORNEIL WAS BACK!!!! felicia slinks over to Zen who is in the corner, eyes narrowed and fists clenched. "hes back." he coughs a low growl only you and Felicia hears. "Remeber you dont have him i do... or thats what he thinks, _______ stay low and remain hidden." You'r so frozen and plae with fear you dont resond, but they know u understood.

The class finally huddles around the teacher as he gives the lesson for today's PE course, " Alright class, get ready for a completly new idea that Corneil came up with here." He gives a thankful nod no Corneil who grunts and keeps his eyes narrowed on Zen, not you, and the teacher finishes, " We are going to wrestle today." There is a hush as the other students notice Zen and Corneil stareing deep into the other's eyes and can almost feel the heat of their rage twords each other grow. "First up, is Zenten and... " a deathly quiet class only stares, "Corneil." Zen roars with acceptence and shows a particularly large set of sharp white teeth. Corneil lowers his head and swings side to side showing off his gigantic horn. Ther eyes meet but hold for the teacher to start the fight. Every single student in full fear realises the depth of this anger and gets against the furthest wall possible.

"No size changing is allowed and no killing, when i deam the victor the fight is over. Ready......" An even deader silence fills the room, no wind, no talk, hell everyone is even holding their breath. "GO!"

Zen roars and snarls as he starts a zig zagged charge twords Corneil. Corneil snorts pure range and lowers his massive head for a charge and begins to move forwards. Just as the two competetors are about to collide Zen does a giant leap to his right after feinting a left that Corneil follows. Zen catches Corneil's upper shoulder and makes a cut, although not that deep, at his side. 'Corneil's hide is think' you think as you stare at a huge version of the forces of the natural kingdom battle it out. Corneil whipps around so fast that Zen hardly gets out of the way in time. The horn makes a cut, even shallower than Zen's because he got farthest away from the horn, into his chest. Zen clashes and 3 deep cuts go into Corneil's horn. The two combatents circle showing that both will be in this for a long time.

In, what seems like hours but is only 30 minutes, the battle was still at a stand still. Corneil had cuts across both shoulders and deep wound in his left flank, one jagged cut across his right eye and some deep scratches in his horn. Zen looked like he survived being even touched by the worst ones, with on deep cut on his rght leg and scratches across his chest and other legs, well he's on all fours so their legs for now, but Zen was getting the worst blow, exhastion. Corneil's massive size and one main attack form plus his slow spped made him on the defenseive more often, while Zen had to close in to use all his weapons effectivly. Zen made one more dashing sprint and leaped, it was higher than all the others, and he spun on the way down, jaws sinking into Corneil's neck. A gasp, the first sign of life from the class, emerges and before the teacher can call off the event Corneil bets all his weight into the side Zen hangs from, shoves him off, and whips his head arounf so fast, your sure he himself recieved whiplash. The enormous horn cuts across Zens back from right shoulder to left leg and Zen goes crashing to the ground. A is struggling to get up, Corneil walks up and places a massive foot on his stomach and pushes down as his horn pushes into Zen's mane. A whislte sounds halting this hiddeous event and signalling the end of the match.

Felicia sprints her full, and gets to Zen to help him up. When she bends over to get Zen's arm around your shoulder you realize there is another hard breath moving her fur. You looks up to see Corneil staring with black, cold, enraged eyes at you, and you know that Corneil wasn't even satisfied yet. Just then the bell rings and Corneil suddenly laughs and whispers to you, " You got off lucky human but you will not live to see tomarrow. No one , not even a worm like you crosses Corneil and gets away with it." He leaves you and Felicia as she flattens her ears and growls a menicing growl you never heard before. Felicia gets Zen up and you take him to the nurse who promises to make sure he heals fine for the rest of the day. Felicia passes by Theodore and stops him.

"Corneil is back and Zen is at the nurse's, he knows i have __________ with me. You have to take him." Theodore only shakes his head in agreement, and like that, you are transfered into Theodore's care for the day. Thankfully none of Theodore's classes mix with Corneil's and you meet Felicia and Albert in science. You manage to sit through it and get to first lunch. As the five of you, disincluding Zen, sit at your table you notice Corneil coming with two of his Herbivore buddies, a Big Horn Ram and a Hippo. "Give us the human and we;ll let you make it to the end of the school day. "Hey theodore," albert calls in a loud enough voice the three Herbivores hear him ," is that green eating over confident lower rung of the food chain talking to us.?" Albert starts to laugh and Corneil advances but Felicia cuts him off. "What's the matter did you UNDERSTAND those words he was saying, you poor stupid beast." Corneil throws a punch which Felicia catches in her enormus grown hand. The Giant hor ram tries to advance and Theodore cuts him off, and Albert does the same to the hippo. Corneil lowers his head, glears his eyes and shouts, " I'm giving you onw last cance, Give me the damn WORK OR I'LL KILL ALL OF YOU!" The entire cafiteria is deathly silent. Felicia just smiles and spin kicks Corneil with and overgrown paw in the chest and flings him onto the heighbooring table.

Chaos insues as carnivores and Herbivore fight each other in an all out brawl. Snarls and grunts echo in the halls and as you stay close to Verena you see Felicia pounce onto Cornel but his massive shoulder catches her and sends her spiralling across the hall and land in a heap. With a speed faster then in the fight Corneil, picks himself up and charges you. Verena tries to grab you when a Zebra clears your table and smashes into her. You start to run when a massive weight smacks you poorly conditioned body across the table you stop before the edge and yell in pain. Seeing stars you see Cornel standing over you beeming, whats the matter? not so confident when you big protectors are hear to save you. He lowers his arm and you roll ou of the way, which results in a extremely painful slide back across to the other side of the table. You try to see the others but the who hall is errupting with fighting still. You reach the edge and your lower, cast covered, half your body goes off and you barely are able to catch the side of the table. The is a huge pounding vibration and your hands slip. You fall down till you crash on the floor.

"How could this happen,' you think, you were amazed how quickly the week has been while Corneil is gone, appart from some shunning durring in PE and Computer Science, and were glad to have time to heal without so much stress. Today was as good as it could get and everything suddenly smashed into a ----en wall and went spiralling down and hit a spicky blood covered pit with no way out. 'How could it happen to me?" was all you thought as you lay mangled on the floor awaiting for that final push to send you over the edge.

Corneil is above you and has one of his massive legs lifted over you, " This is what happens to inferrior pests who try to get in my way." His leg comes down and you close your eyes, even knowing it wouldn't softern the pain, then a feel like your being picked up and carried across the room. You open your eyes and see, well, a smaller version of Verena carrying you across the room and out the door, you look back to see Felicia, Albert and Theodore close behind and relativly unhurt. You are glad to have had suck great friends and as you try to whisper thanks you black out.
1512211221111222211222112.title: Who said Herbivores are harmless?

15122112211112222112221121.content:
You cant believe it has been 4 long weeks..... 5 if you include the time you spent with Felicia. Since the fight in the lunch hall and some of the rules have been changed slightly. In fact no herbivore student was in the same class as a carnivore student. Apart from the usual fight nothing new has broken out and slowly Herbivores and Carnivores began to inter mix again. Although you do run into Corneil every once and a while, nothing serious has broken out.... yet.
* * * * *
"ok Corneil, everyone is here," reports the hipp, from the brawl durring lunch, standing at the door. You snort then look over the group before you, appart from the hippo, big hor ram, and zebra from before, there is an elephant, a couple of bulls, and a mountain goat.
"we know why we are here," a simultanious cry of agreement filled the room, " and i've got the plan to do it."
* * * * *
Unknown to the other Herbivores a set of gleaming ruby red, jeweled eyes watch from above. Taking in every word Corneil says and making a plan that can save the human's life.
* * * * *
You see the houses passing by and Verena stops at one in the center of the neighborhood and goes to the door. You are both greeted by a silver fured vixen and suddenly the lights go off in your head. " your the math teacher for Felicia's class!" The silver vixen smiles and replies, " I see you remeber. I understand your our guest for this week?" You agree, " yes and i hope that math lessons are only given on school hours not afterschool ones." Both and verena and her mom laugh at your joke. " hey mom i was going to take him to my friend;s house." "ok just be back before night." With that you were off.
* * * * *
"Corneil, the Zebra has visual on the vixen and he is following them. Should he make the grab?" You look around and then think of the chances. " Yes, let him know now is perfect." 'Soon, you little work you will be in my grasp and i will squash u once and for all.'
* * * * *
You suddenly get this feeling like you being followed. "Verena, I-" " It's ok, i know, dont worry about it." Soon you feel she starts to pick up speed and soon she makes a left between the houses then a right through some bushes. As you continue, you notice Verena is growing to a smaller size and soon she is hustling you across the ground twords a hole in a house. "Verena, wait..." thats all you say as you get rushed into blackness.
15122112211112222112221121.title: Strategists and Counter-Strategists part 1

151221122111122221122211211.content:
"Corneil, the vixen knew the zebra was following and shrunk sizes and dissappeared. We cant find them." You turn aroung and choke the bull behind you. As you struggles for air you grom white with rage. " FIND THE DAMN IT. FIND THEM." Your roar of raw emotion echos through the forrest.
***
"Verena," you whisper as she sets you on the ground by her, "where are we?" She grabs your arm and leads you through the dark passage. After what seemed like 30 minutes of extreme silence you hear the sound of deep breathing. "Ahhhh, Verena, human, it's good to see you escaped Corneil's plot." "All thanks to your heads up," replies Verena. "Come," speaks the voice, " I have much to divulge to you now.." Slowly Verena leads you through the opaning and you see...
151221122111122221122211211.title: Stratagists and counter-stratagists part2

1512211221111222211222112111.content:
There infront of you, resting in the huge room, was a huge Golden Dragon Anthro. You can't help but gasp and stare. A huge laugh rumbles from the dragon, "I see your amazed that a dragon anthro even exhists, well we are real, though there are few of us in the world." Verena quietly grew back to her origonal size and picked you up in her paw. "I have been watching you for some time now __________, since you first appeared at the school, in fact. I have helped you when all odds seemed desperate." You take in what he says and you search your thoughts for any instences of seeing a golden dragon but none come to mind. The dragon sees your face in thought and elaborates, " I informed Felicia of Corneil's father's position, I warned Zen about Corneil's return, I warned ALL of them about Corneil's plan at lunch and I rescued Verena from the Zebra at lunch... although that was the trickiest part of them all." You take in every word the dragon speaks and take to heart the enormity of this anthro's help.

"it's true," spoke Verena, " I ran into Dagolith one day when i was exploring my size shrinking. I ran into the hole in the house and got lost in the dark. He helped lead me to this room and we talked for a long time. I came back when he asked me to so i knew about Corneil's planned ambush. He also has a greater purpose in your safty like all of ours," she was refering to Zen and the others. Dagolith took up where Verena stopped," I used to be the advisor for the Ocelot who was superintendant to the school and charged with your safty. Corneil's father doesn't know i exist but i have the entire second floor of the school reserved to me. But now all our tasks are much harder to insure that your safe passage through high school insures a greater bond between humans and anthros. But now i have news of Corneil's next plan..." You and Verena listen clostly to what Dagolith has to talk of.

You both take to heart what your tasks are while noting what you have to tell the others. " Leave through this door, they don't know where you are and have given up by now. You both leave and it suddenly hit you that while you listened to Dagolith he never once opened his mouth to speak, but you knew you heard his voice.
1512211221111222211222112111.title: Strategists and Counter-Stratagists part3

choices: the week is a game of cat and mouse
15122112211112222112221121111.content:
Dragon Anthros are a rarity in the world and are said to exsist at, at most 5 in the world in one time. Being at the peak of the Anthro race they are said to have an intelligence that matches a Human's hands down. Their ability to sizechange is mastered at birth and are renowed to have the ability to grow to gigantic sizes, size change key points of their body, and even to shrink if they felt like it. Although not all of their capabilities are known it has been proved that their color of scales dominates their base characteristics.

Red: The Red Dragon has a stocky built body and cannot stand on two legs, despite being an Anthro. It also doesn't have any wings. It is one of the most aggressive Anthro's around and make great war generals.

Blue: The Blue Dragon looks more serpantine then the Red Dragon. It has four legs and almost resembles a Chinese Dragon. It is more passive then the Red and sticks to wisdom and knowledge. This Anthro usually is a Diplomat in times of peace.

Green: The Green Dragon is a thinner build with a narrower snout than the Red. Greens are both passive and Agressive depending on how they feel. They are comonly found supporting either the Blue or the Red Dragon.

Black: The Black Dragon is a mystery. See White Dragon.

White: The White Dragon does not exhist unless the Black Dragon exhists. Both are exact opposites and are depicted as one side of the Ying-Yang. Their true form is unknown.

Gold: The gold dragon also has different forms but seems to embody traits of all dagons except the black and white. The Gold is noticeable for being the best diplomat and Stratagist in all Anthro community.

15122112211112222112221121111111.content:
The Shadowed League
-----------------------------------------------------
Out intentions are our business and not all may join.
We work in places other fail.
Come alone.
We meet where others fail and abilities are tested.
15122112211112222112221121111111.title: The Shadowed League

151221122111122221122211211111111.content:
??????????????????????????????????
-------------------------------------------------------------
Hey guys! We're Back!
Remeber the spot we used to use?
Meet there!

1512211221111222211222112111111111.content:
"Which one looks good to you?"
"I don't know."
"What about you guys?"
"We'll each take one, but you two should go to the FAHAR this week, it looks like the next meeting is this thursday."
"Ok, who knows about SL and that ??? thing?"
" I know about SL,"
"and I know about the ??? one."
"Ok guys, each wek we'll switch off where we go as a pair and where we are."
"Got it."
" See you next week i guess."
"Just to note, no one's going to the Herbivore one right?"
"Duh. But i see your worry, no problem"
1512211221111222211222112111111111.title: The clubs have been chosen

15122112211112222112221121111111111.content:
Verena took you to school while you were asleep and you woke up as the starting bell began to ring. " You looked so peaceful as you slept, I didn't have the heart to wake you."

You go through a relativly easy day and no magor out bursts from Corneil's gang... yet. Today everyone is going to their clubs and you are going with Verena to FAHAR. The meeting was in the school auditorium and apart from, surprisingly, a couple Herbivores, everyone was a Carnivore. The club leader was a Tigress and the meeting started off without a hitch. Today's meeting included having you passed around so everyone could greet you. Apart from the overly enthusiastic Herbivores nothing seemed out of place.

At the end when you were resting in Verena's paws again, the tigress dismisses the meeting for the week. "Melenie," Verena calls to the tigress," Watch the Herbivores they seemed a little to willing to make relations with ___________ so early." Melanie only nodded and stalked off. You just remebered today was the end of your week with Verena and the two of you meet up with Verena and Zen.

"Hey guys, good news. Both SL and ??? have agreed to help us. Oh and Verena," Verena turns to Zen, " I think its finally time _____ sees the house of the one charged to watch him. " You are passed back into Zen's paws after 5, 6 now, long weeks and Zen put you on the shoulder. "Come on man lets go meet my family. Or we could...."
15122112211112222112221121111111111.title: FAHAR

151221122111122221122211211111111111.content:
"Do you have any brothers or sisters Zen?" you ask, curious as to what you should expect as Zen carried you towards his house.
"Actually yes, 2 brothers, and 2 sisters, what about you" Zen replys
"I have ______ sisters and ______ brothers" you answer
"Ah, here we are" Zen answers, opening the door, "Mom, Dad, im home"
Zen carries you up to his room, on the way up the stairs, you see something familiar on the shelf. Do you ask about it?
151221122111122221122211211111111111.title: Meet Zen's familt FINALLY

choices: No, you could blow yourself to kingdom come
1512211221111222211222112111111111111.content:
"Hey Zen, whats that" You ask, pointing to the black objects on the shelf

"Oh, those, they're old videos, wanna watch one?" he asks heading over to grab one, you read the title ROBOTECH. Now you remember, earth is visited by Giants, but they can not change size, and we built robots of sorts to defend ourselves.

"Hey, i remember that show!" you tell Zen as he examines the description on the back.

"Really, i never even watched them" he replys, sort of interested in the tape.

"Giants, similar to antrhos visit the earth, but bring war, they also brought new technolgy, which we learned about and used to defend ourselves" you tell him.

"Sounds a tad scary for well...Humans" he says, "after all, the size-changing scared the hell out of you"

"Here though we had technology to aid us, and the enemy couldn't fix any of their things" you answer, trying to explain it as Zen continues to his room.

"Maybe you could build one of those robot things to help you, theres a parts store down the road, its got everything" Zen says. You consider yourself to be an adept mechanic of sorts, if you crossed Anthro parts, with smaller Human ones, this just could work.

"Alright, i might be able to do something, i guess i should start with their motorcycle" you say, "Do you have a computer?"

"Yeah, its over here" he says as he carries you over, setting you on its keyboard.

Do you actually try to build this stuff?
1512211221111222211222112111111111111.title: YES

15122112211112222112221121111111111111.content:
You climb up on the keyboard and search the internet for a picture of what you'll try to build, meanwhile, Zen sets to work on his homework, which he had in plentiful supply. You find these sites:
http://favoritetoons.com/wallpaper-robot...
http://www.atr-lang.com/data/media/1/Rob...
http://www.dignews.com/admin/screenshoot...
http://kensforce.com/05rob37.jpg

Zen comes over and is quite surprised at what you've found so far. "are you actually gonna buid those!?" he asks

"So long as i can find the needed parts" you reply, then you hear a thundorous sound near the door. Zen sees that you've heard something.

"Thats just my brothers and sisters, its dinner time, afterward, we can search for parts" he says, carrying you down to dinner.
15122112211112222112221121111111111111.title: Give it a shot

151221122111122221122211211111111111111.content:
"Hello _____, we've made human food for you, that way you won't have to starve" a female lion anthro says, this must be Zen's mom.

"Thank-you" you reply as she sets a saucer in front of you with stack of roll-less hamburgers on it. "Wow, those look good!"

"Thank-you, its the first time i've made hamburger" she replies, "it was hard to flip them though, hope you like em'"

"How could i not?" you say, as she brings live-cows for the others, you all dig in, the others try some of the burgers and find that they like them.

"Wow, that was good" you say after everyone's done.

"I didn't think i'd get it right" the Zen's mom said

Zen comes over and picks you up before you can reply, "Me and ____ are going down to the parts and models store for a little project" Zen says, carrying you out the door.
151221122111122221122211211111111111111.title: Dinner

1512211221111222211222112111111111111111.content:
As Zen carried you along the side-walk, you got an idea, if they can grow their clothes, couldn't he grow you?
"Hey Zen, if you can grow your clothes, couldn't you grow me?" you ask

"I don't know, nobody's ever tried, do you wanna be the first?" he replys

"Sure, maybe something will help me" you say.

Zen comes down to his absolute minimum of 20ft. tall and starts to focus on you.

Does it work?
1512211221111222211222112111111111111111.title: A new idea enroute

1512211221111222211222112111111111111111.content:
Quite surprising to you, everything around you gets smaller and smaller. Zen stops when you are just taller than him.

"Wow, i didn't think that would work" Zen said, sort of staring, more or less, shocked to see you from this perspective.

"Cool, at least now i should be safe from Corniel" you say, looking around at what had been huge suroundings, now brought to a human perspective.

"C'mon, we should head home, no point in getting parts if your big enough to defend yourself" you both turn about and return to Zen's house, he grows you to the correct size for his house, but can not grow himself.

"Uh-oh" he says, when he can not change size. "do you think that maybe my changing was transferred to you?"

"Maybe, how would i change size, or yours for that matter?" you ask, hoping to help him.

"You have to focus on yourself or an object and concentrate on growing or shrinking" Zen says, hoping to at least reach his needed size.

"ok, i'll try" you say, you look down and concentrate, sure enough, he grew. He then tried to change his size on his own, and it worked, you tried and it worked as well!

"Cool! We can both change size!" you say, "How did i get it though?"

"Maybe its a mental thing, but at least now you'll be safe, and can do better in some of our classes" Zen says, looking forward to the coming days. You concentrate, and find that you can also resume your human size and a bit smaller if you want as well.

"So, what do we do now Zen?" you asks

"How bout'...........
1512211221111222211222112111111111111111.title: Yes

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
"Wow, i don't think i even have to build anything" you exclaim, looking at a fairly cheap model of a Vari-tech.

"From that thing" Zen says as you start inspecting it. You find the cock-pit and climb in to find that the cockpit is fully-functional.

"Hey Zen, this is a full functional Varitech," you shout, you recall the TV series and put the helmet on, and say "Computer, begin start-up" the fighter starts up.

"Are you actually gonna fly that thing?" Zen asks worried for your safety.

"Kind of, right now its in 'Compact mode' a storage form of sorts, wanna get it? then i can show you what they can really do" you tell Zen as you make sure everything'll work.

"its only $10, thats even less than lunch, sure" he says, walking to the front counter, meanwhile, the fighter is ready for take-off. You switch to guardian, a hybrid of robot and fighter, increase the throttle and fly over to Zen, and follow him out the door.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: The parts store

choices: What else can this thing do...
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
"So what can that little thing do?" Zen asks, curious as to how this toy could possibly help.

"Well, it can change size, just like any anthros, and with some luck, give me a fighting chance against Corniel" you tell Zen, as he continues walking.

"Alright, get it to 50ft. tall, for you" Zen says, not believing it could change size.

"Ok" you say, backing it up a bit, you get it to 50ft. but apparently it can go no larger. "dang, it won't go any farther"

"Hey, it crew some-what, now the question is, whats faster? It or me" he says, challenging you to a race.

"Probably this" you say, following along.

"Alright, on 3" he says, while you get ready to use Fighter mode.

"1.....2.......3" and you were both off, you dropped down some as it transitioned modes, but you quickly sped up, and soon passed Zen.

"hey, your going faster than me!" he said, trying to speed up, but you just pored on the throttle, you quickly switched into guardian, using its legs to stop, right at his house. You both headed in, though this time, somewhat under your own power.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Heading Home

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
You quickly ascend the stairs and enter Zen's room, oddly, nobody even noticed the robot in the house, maybe they were all out or something. Up in Zen's room, you notice that it only has 3 size options, Compact-Standard-Expanded, while Compact, it is twice as long as you are tall, and can only use Guardian and Fighter modes. At standard it is around the size of a Human military F-14 or F/A-18, and at Expanded, it can reach just over 50ft. long, and like-wise, just over 50ft. tall in Battle-oid (robot mode).

"Dang, this thing only has 3 sizes" you tell Zen.

"Bummer, but its better than nothing" he says, "How good can you fight in it?"

"Well, it replicates its missiles/bullets so i can shoot as long as i want, but im not sure about hand-to-hand, theres 2 knives, a bayonet, a pistol and the gun makes a nice club." you reply, not sure just how well you truly could fight.

"Wanna fight me?" Zen offers, so as to test the Fighter.

"Sure, will you change your size, or stay normal?" you ask, just to be ready.

"i can't exactly get all too large in here, and i'd probably make a mess outside, so i'll just go between 20 and 60 of your ft." he replys as he takes up position.

"Ready?" you ask

"On 3" he replies.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: What else can this thing do...

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
You start out in Battleoid mode, and charge forward using the engines for a burst of speed and force. Zen tries to hold his ground, but you quickly adjust your wings and pivot a full 180* and throw him off, you then hit guardian and then fighter mode, flying out of the house, outside, you climb to about 200ft. for a human and dive downward switching to guardian in time to grab Zen and then begin a rapid accent sky-ward, stopping at several thousand feet up for Zen's current hight.

"Uncle, Uncle" Zen says, seeing the drop below.

"Seems like a pretty capable defense method" you say as you descend towards the ground and head back into Zen's room.

"So, what else can you do besides fight and fly?" Zen asks, starting to wonder if there were anything this thing couldn't do. You meanwhile land and switch into fighter mode, shutting almost everything off.

"Yep, just watch" you reply, you hit a RED button on the right side of the dash panel, in a flurry of speed, the canopy releases as you soar skyward, while behind you a small square intercepts you. You grab it and hit 3 or 4 hidden buttons and the cube opens into a motorcycle form, which you soon straddle as it closes up around you. Enclosing you in a battleoid like form, holding you airborne in just the same manner as the Varietch below, except this used energy formed wings, but still had the booster on the back, and the leg engines.

"Wow, where'd that come from!" Zen says, not expecting that you could move that fast, or that you could have done that much in the space of less than 2 seconds.

You descend and switch it back into motorcycle mode and drive up to Zen to show off your additional toy.

"Im not sure, but i believe theres a lot more it'll do, i just have to learn the controls correctly, i know with that matter-replicator i have infinite everything, and can at will deploy its armor.

"Armor?" Zen asks, not having seen it as anything but an aluminum toy. You drive over and restow the motorcycle (Cyclone) and hop in, again starting everything up, as you switch into battleoid, you deploy extra boosters, weapons bays, and thick armor plating. Then you stow these and deploy a strong, silver metal/armor over the whole craft, which you invite Zen to attack, but he can not dent, scratch or bend it.

"Thats one tough little ship" Zen says, seeing that your almost impervious in it.

"Yep, and im planning on using it at school from now on" you say

"How're you gonna hide it, not like they're gonna except it all to well" Zen says

"The replicator can absorb the whole thing and compact it down to a high-tech back-pack." you reply going up and hitting a series of buttons in side, and sure enough, it reduced to a highly complex back-pack, it even absorbed your books.

Zen yawned and you looked at the clock, it was getting late, bed time.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: The fight

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
"Wanna get ready for bed?" you ask as Zen picks you up.
"yeah, we've got a long day tommorow" you reply, Zen carries you into the bathroom. Inside, you retrieve your night clothes/PJ's, tooth brush, and such from the back-pack (it also got all your other things, after all, its nearly indestructable). You quickly bathe in the sink and use the boosters and wings built into the pack to fly out and back to Zen's room.

"Well, at least i didn't have to get you" Zen says, not expecting to see you yet flying, you hover and then head for your cot sitting on Zen's night stand. Zen heads out to get ready for bed. You meanwhile, fiddle with the pack, and find it can implant a transponder in you to give you more abilities, and it can at times access your thoughts, this surprised you. You set all that up in just a matter of minutes and set it to stay within three feet of you at all times, but not to listen to your thoughts until you thought "Listen to Me" three times, and at that, only if you were concious.

Zen returned and laid down in his bed, you did like-wise in your cot as Zen turned off the lamp above you.

"Good night _____" Zen said

"Good night Zen" you say back, Zen falls asleep in just seconds, luckily he didn't snore.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Get ready for bed

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
You wake up at 4 A.M. and try as you might, can not get back to sleep. In another hour or so, Zen would be getting up for school as well. You, meanwhile activate the neural interface of the back-pack and use it to fly to the bathroom where you hastily get changed and somehow return just as Zen is waking up. You land back on the night-stand and have the pack absorb all your stuff.

"Good morning Zen" you say, sitting cross-legged on the night stand.

"Good-morning, what time is it?" Zen asks, sitting up in bed.

"A little after 5" you answer, watching a look of panic spread on his face.

"We're gonna be late" he starts panicing, getting dressed and hurredly grabbing supplies.

"Whats the big deal, it won't take that long to get there" you ask, rather confusedly.

"Yeah, right, how am i gonna get there without hurting you?" he asks, apparently he has indeed noticed that you are harmed by their speeds, at least when your held.

"I'll fly," You calmly say, and start to explain "We can handle almost any speed, its just we have to be ready for it, in the fighter, i am perfectly fine and preped."

"Great, im still not slowing down." Zen says, still grabbing everything in sight.

You expand the pack into standard form- battleoid(giant-robot) and start helping him, as he rushes, you find that the replicator can also make human food, you have it create pancakes and dig in, in your 3D control center, (the battloid mode places you in a spherical control area with various controls and monitors all around you, oddly, theres only 2 pedals, but they're attatched to a leg assembly which mimicks your leg movments, and the pedals are for the leg engines.) Anyway, when Zen's finally ready, its 5:40 and your running late, by normal standards.

"Ah great, we're gonna be late" Zen moans as he runs out the door, you switch down to compact mode with boosters, in fighter mode. Zen rapidly accelarates to several hundred MPH on all fours, you roll left just slightly so that the aircraft slides to his right, you firewall the main engines and find that you have shot far past Zen, leaving an anthro sonic-boom in your wake, knocking him pretty hard, but he rocovers. When you reach the school, you find...
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Use the Varitech at school

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
You maintain compact mode, but switch over to guardian, and try to evade Corneil until help arrives. Unfortunately, he spots you.

"Hey, i see the human's back" he says, "get down here wimp"

"Ok" you say, fed up with his harrasment, Zen is only 5 minutes behind, and you think you can "Jam" his size-changing.

"What, co-operating, thats a twist" he starts to say, then makes a grab for you. You go full reverse thrust, swinging the legs forward, and then hit expanded mode and with it, armored battloid, the armor and boosters are out in seconds.

"Got a new toy i see?" Corniel says, apparently planning to wreck your fighter, he charges forward and punches you, but you just stagger back, the armor is perfectly intact.

"Gonna fight?" you taunt, "Gonna have to hit harder than that"

Corniel roars with rage, you notice that he's probably gonna grow, you order the computer (fighter, it listens to you), "Activation active matter jamming" Corniel then shows total shock as he can not grow, and can not shrink, he is screwed.

"Whos the tough-guy now?" you say, ready for hand to hand. You quickly re-tract the boosters and switch to your ablative armor, much lighter, and stronger, but you can't fire as many missiles.

"No, your still a wimp, i'll tear that thing limb-from-limb" corniel says, charging at you, you side-step and as he misses grab his out-stretched fist and fire the engines- full throttle. You and he sky-rocket upward, at about 10,000ft. for him, you start to push downward towards the solid ground.

"If you don't surrender now, im gonna driver you straight into the pavement" you say, he doesn't say anything the whole way, at the last minute you stop, shaking him more than a little.

"Ha! I knew you couldn't do it" Corniel says. You bring the arm back and let him have it, you hit with just enough force to knock him out, good thing you've been pulling your punches.

Zen arrives minutes later. "How'd you do that!?!" he asked, shocked that you took him down.

"I figured out how to stop him from growing, its only keyed to those i pick right now, i could block everyone if i wanted" you answer. He is not exactly excited by this thought, but at the same time, non to upset.

"Thats a tad scary, all things considered." he says. "Gonna hide that thing from the others?"

"Yeah" you say as you get out and form it back into a back-pack. You fly up and land in Zen's waiting paw.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Corniel

choices: Ok, summary of the day aside, lets get to the fight...
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
Things had been un-eventfull until first lunch. Apparently, word had spread about your new defense, and the herbivores were out for blood. During the day, you'd used the neural interface to continue work on your size jamming, and had found it possible to reduce any anthro to less-than human size, after you created a separete program for this, you found a virtual model of the fighter (Vari-tech from now on). You explored it and found that while expanded, it contained a miniature ship of sorts, it had a bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, living room, and a series of support rooms, such as a lab, engineering, and oddly a bridge aside from the cockpit. Having found out quite a bit, you review what you know so far.

Vari-tech-
3 modes-
Fighter- an airplane/fighter/ship resembling an F-14 or F/A-18
Guardian/Gerwalk- a hybrid of the fighter and robot. The legs are deployed downward,
arms
extended, gun attatched to an arm and the booster manuevers to
provide forward movement.
Battloid- A large humanoid shaped robot, the engines function as legs and the
cockpit retracts into the main body. The gun is carried in the hand
and the wings are upright. You sit in a 3D cockpit where you sit in a
center chair and have monitors providing a sourounding view, as for
the pedals, they attatch to your legs and have the bot mimic they're
movments, and the pedals link to the thrust.

Size modes-
Expanded- The figher is 50ft. long, likewise the battleoid is 50ft. tall, the
Guardian/Gerwalk is in between.
Standard- The fighter is the same size as a real F-14/ F/A-18, the robot is a tad
taller than fighter is long, and again, the gerwalk is a hybrid.
Compact- The fighter is twice as long as you are tall, very manuverable and
fast, can only switch into gerwalk/guardian.
Back-pack- The entire fighter and contents use replicator tech. to reduce into a
back-pack.

Cyclone

- a motorcycle like vehicle which when stowed is a small cube, slightly larger than a back-pack.

Cycle mode- it carries a small rocket system and boosters, you ride it like any other
motorcycle.
Armor/walking mode - the cycle closes up and covers various parts of you in its armor
and systems. The rockets, boosters, and cloak are fully
functional, for flight, a pair of energy generate wings can be
deployed.

Alright, now that things have been un-intentionally reviewed, to the fight.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Un-eventfull day until lunch

choices: Go to the AFTERSCHOOL Fahar meeting
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
Alright, anyway, as you sat there on Zen's tray, enjoying the school's cheese-burgers. The table is slowly surounded, no doubt a plan of Corniel's. As they close, you use that helpfull neural interface and block the herbivore size change, as everyone starts to realize the coming fight, Corniel comes from the crowd of Herbivores.

"Give us the puny human, and we won't hurt you" Corniel says, and then adds "Much'.
As he talked, you got ready to take-off. As Zen was about to tell him just what he could do with that, you ran along the table and took-off into the air, out of everyone's reach and set the pack to standard Vari-tech, you fell for a brief few seconds, but had the fighter catch you.

"Hey, if you won't me, ya gotta get me" you say as you switch into Battloid and fall towards the ground, once down you deploy the Ablative armor and brace for a fight. Seeing that your gun could be used against you, you de-replicate it before anyone gets their hands on it.

"This is gonna be fun" someone in the gathered crowd says.

"We'll see" you say "Zen, i've got corniel"

Corniel charges forward, you do like wise, useing the jets and boosters as a sort of air-born pair of skates, at the last minute, you cut the engines and contact the ground and then turn and trip him. He recovers and comes at you again, this time he tries to punch you. Before he has a chance, you grab his outstretched arm and twist it behind his back, taking out his knees as you proceeded, he started to come at you with his other hand, which you grabbed and pinned just as well. He was totally pinned, you grabbed a piece of near-by string and tied his arms together, and then his legs, he couldn't move.

"Who's next?" you say, the other herbivores begin to retreat except a few brave enough to face you and your friends. Your friends managed to scare off the few remaining herbivores without harming them. In the meantime, you had to get Corneil taken care of. You switched to Gerwalk and used its arms, vertical thrust, and stability to carry Corniel to the Principal's office where you explained what occured and then took him to the nurse. The principal understood, but could not do anything.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Ok, summary of the day aside, lets get to the f...

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
You've already been to the meeting during the last school period and know that this meeting is just going to be a class about humans, to you, nothing but boring. You, feeling tired of being carried all day, bring out your fighter and use its battle-oid form at standard size and start walking home with Zen. As you walk, you notice that Zen, is moving back and forth in a skating pattern instead of a walking line. You bring up a display of whats behind you and see that he is in fact whereing in-line skates, you stop for a second and activate the booster, but just long enough for the replicator to add a wheel in line with the thrust nozzle of the battleoids legs, and you start to skate as well. Now, luckily, because of the way the battle-oid cockpit is designed, you really can't tell between being a giant, and being normal doing the same actions, and with the inertial dampeners shut down, you feel the same movements.

"hey, where'd those come from" Zen asks, noticing your skates, "Copier"

"Nah, i just wanted to skate, do you ever play hockey?" you say as you skate down the sidewalk, picking up speed.

"Every now and then, why? Do you" Zen replies,

"Yeah, wanna see if we can get a game going between everyone?" You say, hoping to get some fun in.

"Shouldn't be to hard, and theres a YMCA that does have a pretty good hockey set-up." he replies, considering your idea. "Shouldn't be to hard"

"Great, so then, race yeah" you say, charging forward, as he gains, you get an idea, that booster on your back is still fully functional. Looking at your various controls, and thought-commands, you find that you can think it on. You bend downward in a more braced position and take-off forward,

"Hey, thats cheating!" Zen yelled behind you, so you turn of the booster, come in behind him and out do him, without the booster, he looks rather embaraced from all this, being outrun by someone a fraction of his size.

"You still cheated, that machine let you win" he accuses you, not to upset, but still.

"Actually, this machine can only bring my movments out to your scale, it replicates what i do in here" you explain, just trying to calm him.

"Well, thats a first, an anthro beaten by a human." he said jokingly.

You both head in to his house and up to his room, you switch to expanded fighter so as to have all the comforts of home.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Heading to Zen's house

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
As dinner-time approaches, you decide to get out that motorcycle, except, as you explore the Vari-tech, you find that it has a "hangar" bay of sorts with a replicator holding a plethora of smaller craft, ranging from jet-packs to enviro-suits, to the cyclone to smaller aircraft. You look through the database and find the cyclones, apparently, there are many variants for many tasks. You ultimately settle on a smaller hybrid craft carrying a micro-replicator on board, you have it materialized and see a small board materialize. As you step on it, your neural link connects with the board and a 3D hud appears in your vision, a new experience, but you reason it is a flight set-up. This board has multiple forms just like the vari-tech fighter, as you meddle in the hud, you find the replicator systems and discover the board can act as a flying skateboard, skates, a jetpack with jet boots, a "solar" surfer, and for some reason, a phase cannon.

Well, now that you know what it does, you wonder how fast can it go, as your wondering, the board leaps into the air and onto your back, spinning off many pieces and then connecting to them, when its finally finished, you have a sleek wing on your back with a booster in the center, connecting to a set of boots and a set of goggles and gloves. As you continue your wondering, the HUD gives you directions to walk over to a catapult like device and kneel down, as you do so, you notice the knee and elbo pads. Then, on-screen it shows what will happen, and suddenly, you know everything about it, as if it placed it into your mind, a scary thought.

Well, what the heck could you lose, you begin a set of pre-flights and have the catapult launch you, as you fly forward, you see the engines part and you go flying out between them at what must be at least mach 1. You soar out and take flight, nearly ramming into Zen who quickly dives to the right, you quickly bring yourself to a stop and fly over to Zen, he stairs down at yo in surprise.

"Well know, when'd you get wings?" Zen asked teasingly as you landed in his open hand.

"I found in the Vari-tech's shuttle bay" you answer, looking at Zen's surprised look.

You both here the stampede of Zen's siblings and know its dinner time, dinner is un-eventfull.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Dinner

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
Using the mind-link you had to the fighter and all its technology, you instructed the fighter to take off in gerwalk form and follow you out as you flew towards the door in the jet-pack.

Screaming out Zen's room door you roll right low on the floor towards the stairs heading to the first floor. As you dart along at a relatively slow pace for the anthro's you here booming noises behind you, using the neural link you acess the jet-pack's sensors and a rear-view to discover its two titan boys, Zen's younger brothers, though certainly not little compared to you.

The varietech is behind them hovering, so if things get bad, at least you've got a method of rescue. Heading down the hall you notice the two are aiming for you like kittens loose on a fly. There enormous threat was enough of a threat that enough was enough, though first of course was the verbal warning before it was enforced by hot lead.

Rolling onto your back, you climbed upward and then bent upward, keeping your legs straight ahead so the back-booster gave you lift and the boots kept you ahead of the kids.

"Hey! Mind NOT trying to step on me?" You yelled, a tad angrily than you'd meant, but there was enough trouble with the herbivores.

"Sorry" both kids say, though from the sounds of it, they weren't.

Rather than wait to find out, you roll onto your back again, ramrod straight and pick up the pace for the stairs, arcing up, rolling on your side and shooting through the railings, as the wall cut off to be replaced by a bit of railing so this area looked over the entrance. Once through you did a quick roll headed for the open door, you shot out and into the neighborhood seeking the hokey game quite likely already under way.

Finding your friends in the culvesac you discover you were right, they had already started. Rather than interrupt, you have the fighter land on the sidelines and await your orders for now, though it was to alert you to any threats to itself and you.

In the meantime, you buzzed down onto the game like a little fly, just barely avoiding being nailed by your titan friends, their hokey-sticks, and the puck itself. You laughed to yourself as no-one noticed your presence, at least for now, so you hung out buzzing around the game watching from the air.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: HOCKEY

choices: Too Late, gotta head homeword (with Verena)
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
Your friends have just started, so your stuck watching them play for now, sure you could invade, but that just wasn't something you'd do.

Shooting up, down, left, and right you dodge the hokey sticks, puck and your friends, in fact you find that it may actually be possible to play like this, except you needed something to move the puck with, it'd crush you at the moment.

You came to a hover and watched as Zen scored a point from afar with a nice, precision shot that shot right past or under everyone in its path to the goal, scoring in the second point of the game, all on Zen's team.

Then, that neural link provided the answer to that problem, how to play without the varietech. A series of schematics appeared before your eyes, there was another configuration of the cyclone, one that'd combine it with the glider/jet board. "Perfect!" you said, luckily quiet enough that your friends didn't hear.

Quickly you cut out the vertical thrust, sunk and then brought the engines back up in a full-speed dash to the varietech. Far above it you sent the signal for it to launch the cyclone, this one was in a different configuration and launched out of the shuttle bay.

It came out flat looking like an over-grown hover-board and shot towards you. Then, it suddenly broke apart into a hundred pieces each one coming over a part of you and expanding into part of an armor suit, making you look a great deal like some of those super-heroes from comics back home, at least the regular people who built armor to be super.

You eyes now had a fortune of data being projected onto them, you saw power-readings, weapons statuses, flight data, shield readings, structural readings and more; a comic geeks dream. And your opportunity to test the new suit came right at you in the form of a proximity warning, the sensors of the new battle-suit read out the puck heading right for you.

Quickly you concentrate on the weapons and a nice, long energy sword forms out of your hand, about a foot lock to the Anthros, and perfect for handling an approaching puck. As it approached you brought up your arm and braced yourself leaning forward with the aft booster ready for full power.

SLAM! You smashed it and were knocked back a few ft. but hey, you hadn't remembered to fire off that aft booster. Your friends looked around wondering what had sent that puck back their way, and at that faster than they'd sent it yours.

Wanting to surprise them, you decided to jettison the new armor for now and re-combine later. It fell off and re-formed below in its original form, which you now got a better look out. It had two large boosters/cannons in its back and the wheels came off of those with the body forming a delta-wing around it, it in fact would've worked fine as a hover-board.

As the animals neared, you flew up to meet Zent, "Hey everyone," you say, "having fun?"

"Yes" Zen replies, "how the heck did you manage to shoot that back? Without the varietech?"

"With this" you reply, signaling the booster-cyclone to take off and re-combine.

As before it splinters apart and forms around you, the boosters attatching to your back and angling off, the tires on your legs, a helmet replicating over you from a rounded part. The new information came in front of your vision, and more, it had now started scanning your friends, outlining them and from your memory marking them all friendly, though it did still seem to have formulated an escape path.

"Armor suit" you explain, "made out of a cyclone, it seems to have been built for this and has numerous configurations, a lot more than anything else I've found yet." With a thought you have the helmet retract, at least for now to talk face to face, "I used an energy sword to send the puck flying, though this has a lot more yet."
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Its a LONG game

"Ok" you moan, hating to miss out on the hockey at hand.

"Wanna race?" she asks, wanting to see how good your new 'toys' were.

You answer
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Too Late, gotta head homeword (with Verena)
