Just as Verena bolted off the armor finished and you chased after her and eventually rocketed past, following a course on your eyes, leading to the cat's house. Just as your about to reach her house, an alert comes up, there's three herbivores dead ahead in front of her house.

You quickly flip over and fire the engines at full thrust and come to a dead stop, hovering behind a mail-box waiting on the cavalry. It was possible to fight, but that'd show the herbivores they had your schedule cracked, and it'd take you a few seconds to get into the Varitech.

Verena rounded the corner and spotted the enemies, too many for her to take on, and made a quick turn around, heading back the way she came. You followed after her, diving into the grass for cover and making sure you stayed right with her.

A short while down the road, she stopped and you hovered up in front of her. "What'll we do!" you say, in an all but panick.

"Falicia's house, they'd never suspect it" Verena answers, taking off running towards the larger end of town. You flip over and follow her again, staying right up next to her head this time, deciding to screw stealth and make for speed over all else.

Nearing Felicia's house, Verena started getting bigger and bigger with the suroundings, ending up at...
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Yes!

1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.content:
The day goes un-eventuflll, during which, you review the occurances and what your new tech can do.

During the day, you'd used the neural interface to continue work on your size jamming, and had found it possible to reduce any anthro to less-than human size, after you created a separete program for this, you found a virtual model of the fighter (Vari-tech from now on). You explored it and found that while expanded, it contained a miniature ship of sorts, it had a bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, living room, and a series of support rooms, such as a lab, engineering, and oddly a bridge aside from the cockpit. Having found out quite a bit, you review what you know so far.

Vari-tech-
3 modes-
Fighter- an airplane/fighter/ship resembling an F-14 or F/A-18
Guardian/Gerwalk- a hybrid of the fighter and robot. The legs are deployed downward,
arms
extended, gun attatched to an arm and the booster manuevers to
provide forward movement.
Battloid- A large humanoid shaped robot, the engines function as legs and the
cockpit retracts into the main body. The gun is carried in the hand
and the wings are upright. You sit in a 3D cockpit where you sit in a
center chair and have monitors providing a sourounding view, as for
the pedals, they attatch to your legs and have the bot mimic they're
movments, and the pedals link to the thrust.

Size modes-
Expanded- The figher is 50ft. long, likewise the battleoid is 50ft. tall, the
Guardian/Gerwalk is in between.
Standard- The fighter is the same size as a real F-14/ F/A-18, the robot is a tad
taller than fighter is long, and again, the gerwalk is a hybrid.
Compact- The fighter is twice as long as you are tall, very manuverable and
fast, can only switch into gerwalk/guardian.
Back-pack- The entire fighter and contents use replicator tech. to reduce into a
back-pack.

Cyclone

- a motorcycle like vehicle which when stowed is a small cube, slightly larger than a back-pack.

Cycle mode- it carries a small rocket system and boosters, you ride it like any other
motorcycle.
Armor/walking mode - the cycle closes up and covers various parts of you in its armor
and systems. The rockets, boosters, and cloak are fully
functional, for flight, a pair of energy generate wings can be
deployed.

Anyway, unintentional reviews aside, on to the meeting.
1512211221111222211222112111111111111112.title: Skip to the Fahar meeting

You tell her she can explore while you fly for her house, but also warn her not to touch anything. In-flight you start to explore the Vari-tech's design specks for what must be the millionth time, you still haven't finished, but each time you find new features and today you've found out that in expanded mode, the aft of the fighter or Gerwalk can function as a hangar bay/Garage for a plethora of craft stored in the replicator system. As you fly, you realize that you can pilot via the neural uplink, so you exit the cockpit and head back towards the crew/living areas, which you've learned are replicated and can be changed at will, not quite a bad idea. You encounter Vareena at the bridge, which you assume is for a crew on its space missions, Vareena is currently examining everything in site.

"Having fun" you ask, startling her, she quickly turned around to face you.

"Ummm, whos flying the ship?" she asked, starting to sound worried.

"Me, my mind is linked with the ship" you explain, slightly calming her, but not much.

"How long til' we get there, my house is probably the farthest out" she said.

"About 5 minutes, we're actually going slow, i could go faster" You explain, heading towards the hangar bay.Vareena followed behind.

"Where're you going" she asks, wondering what you'll do next.

"The Hangar-bay, im gonna land in Gerwalk mode and then let you out and get you back to normal" you say as you are about to open the double-doors into the bay.

"Aren't i normal now?" she asked, slightly concerned.

"Im not sure, i think that the increased reduction prevents your growth, but you can try when we land" you explain, she is quite clearly worried. "Why don't you try shrinking more, say to my palm"

"ok" she says, and surprisingly, she in fact reaches your palm's size. But quickly returns to human size. "Mind stopping to let me out? I wanna try for Antrho size"

"sure" you say, walking over to the hangar's replicator, you have it form a jet-pack/hover-board device which you intend to follow Vareena out in to ensure her safety. "I'll go out in this first to catch you if this doesn't work" you walk over and open the doors as the craft switches into Gerwalk mode and hovers about 100 Anthro FT. up (AFT.) You go flying out off the catapult, Vareena follows, does she enlarge?

The trip to school

15122112211112222112221122.content:
(In Felicia's Perspective)

-4 Months earlier-

We brought [Your Name] to the nurses office as fast as we could. When she seen him though she said he need a hospital. So she called 911, and with in minutes an ambulance was there to pick [Your Name] up. When we got to the hospital we needed to wait a little while because a human doctor needed to be called in, but when the doctor arrived he started to examine [Your Name], but he was too late. [Your Name] had slipped into a coma. The doctors had him put on life support, but they weren't really giving him any benefit of the doubt. They said that if his vitals turned for the worst that they would unplug his life support. Luckily his vitals have stayed the same for now at least. I just hope he pulls through, even though the doctors keep saying he won't make it. I have faith and so does Verena,Albert,Theodore, and Zen. I can't help but feel like its my fault though. If I hadn't let Corneil throw me across the cafeteria I would have been able to save [Your Name] from harms way. I just really hope he pulls through.

-Present Day-

(Still in Felicia's Perspective)

It's been 4 months now and I'm so worried. Everyday I he'd to the hospital and stay their till visiting hours are over, or I pay one of the nurses to let me say the night in [Your Name]'s room. I'm just so scared and I feel so guilty about the whole thing. I shouldn't have jumped at Corneil and let him throw me. It was stupid of me. It's a good thing Corneil got lock up for assisting a fellow student, or else I would be paranoid.

"Hey Felicia! Are you okay? It looks like your in another trance." Albert said interrupting my train of thought.

"Yeah what's up with you? Are you thinking about [Your Name] again?" Asked Verena.

"What... Oh sorry guys... Yeah I can't stop thinking about him... I'm just so worried about him." I said.

"Yeah we all are. If you want we could go see how he is doing." Said Zen.

"Yeah that would be great if we could." I responded. It helps me deal with the current situation when I check on [Your Name]'s condition I thought to myself.

A few minutes later we arrived at the hospital and [Your Name] was still there. His condition was still the same. He was still in a coma. Still lying in bed. It brought a tear to my eye seeing him like this.

"Don't worry Felicia he'll make I know he will." Said Verena.

"Yeah he's a tuff little guy." Albert said trying to reassure you like Verena.

"It's my fault though if I hadn't jumped at Corneil and let him throw me away from [Your Name] he would be like this!" You yelled. You then fell to your knees and started to cry.

"Hey Felicia, its ok, its not your fault." Zen said .

"Yeah its Corneil's fault not yours." Verena says trying to stop you from crying any further. But its no use, you can't stop yourself. You felt so guilty about everything that it was practically eating you from the inside out.

While all of this was going on, everyone had failed to see that...
15122112211112222112221122.title: 4 moths later

choices: Math class is next, as if to drive the point home...
Study hall. You hit the library, determined to at least try to even the field.
You try to find that collie before the next class starts. You need her notes!
15122112212.content:
"Greetings, class, and welcome to freshman science for Renosqua High," the walrus says in a drawling voice with a slight gurgle to it. "I am Professor Dillident. Please review the syllabus on your own time, as we do not have room in the schedule to waste. This semester will mark the final part of your comprehensive studies on leputian-type energy transformations and Z-X axis extradimensional quantum variations."

Comprehensive studies on what? What did he say? You think, your mind incredulous.

"We will begin on chapter 4, as chapters 1 to 3 should be old material," the walrus drones, not breaking his monotone stride. "As we already know, leputons initially reside in ZZ-axis space as chelysons, where they are passed through a Fettchen-Boar funnel and activated before synchronizing with molecules in a counter-preditive manner..."

You slowly feel your stomach worry into your pelvis as you see him turn around without further explanation, rapidly jotting down rapid-fire symbols for proofs and mathematical formulae that you've never seen before. You try to copy as much as you can, but are constantly forced to choose between what he says and what he writes for your note-taking.

"...which, using Macropian's Constant, gives us this formula here. Now, notice this variable here, an XZ-position with a gravitic leputon-chelyson bind, which we're going to unpack- it consists of...."

As the lecture goes on, you can feel the blood rushing out of your face as worry turns to panic. Every third word in every single sentence is one you've never heard of. It's almost like you're in a language class instead. This can't be real, you think to yourself as you shake your head disbelievingly. Surely others here in the class must be thinking the same as you?

You look up at Zen, and feel a stab of betrayal as you see a look of clear half-lidded boredom in his eyes. His eyes are fixed on the board, but not only is he not scared of this class at all, it's barely challenging him. He yawns, briefly exposing two rows of fangs as long as your arm, then writes a few passive notes. He's not alone- as you look around the classroom, you can tell his is a popular sentiment. A collie seems to be writing down notes furiously, but in front of her a panda rubs his eyes to stay awake. An iguana balances his pens against each other. The gazelle next to you scrolls through her phone, completely indifferent.

And there you sit, in your toy desk, surrounded by titans, completely and utterly lost.

"-which gives us a total answer of 5.342 microtons per n-motion. And remember- you will be asked to show your work for *every* problem you get," Dillident finishes evenly. "Did everyone get the same answer? Raise your hand if you did."

There's a slight whoosh through the air, and as you look around, every anthro in the class has a paw, claw, or hand-analogue up. You raise yours tentatively, afraid of judgment for falling behind.

"Good," Dillident burbles in neutral satisfaction. "Now, we move on to..."

Helplessly abandoning the class as it is being taught, you lower your hand and turn back to chapter one of the textbook, figuring you might as well start catching up- and there, as you slowly mouth the title of chapter 1 to yourself, your stomach settles from panic and alarm to full-blown dread.

"A brief overview of quantum mechanics." As introductory, prerequisite material. As chapter one. And, as you look through the textbook soberly, easily making up the first 130 pages, in size 1 font or so.

Defeated, you slump in your chair. There's no other conclusion to make: you're completely and utterly out of your league.

The rest of the class passes in the same incomprehensible blot of of a presentation as the first ten minutes. As the class bell rings and your giant classmates fill the air with shuffling, stomping movement to pack up and leave, you close your notebook with a terminal thud, looking forlornly at the board ahead. "Study chapters 4 and 5, and practice problems 6 through 24. And be ready for a mini-quiz next class!" Dillident calls out before anyone leaves, as he turns to the board. Dillident is wiping it down already, and you didn't even copy down half of what he'd written, let alone what he'd said. You are completely off-guard when Zen's paw swoops under you and knocks your knees out, letting you fall into his firm brown-padded palm.

"Easy points!" Zen scoffs confidently as he shoulders his bookbag and walks out.
"You... you think so?" You say, trying not to betray your insecurity.
Zen waves his hand dismissively. "Oh, please! Chapter 1 isn't even proper science, these mechanics are just building on stuff they taught us in size-changing class back in elementary school when I was a cub. Chapters 2 and 3 are all about the nature of where we get our extra mass from when we shape-change. We went over it so many times in middle school that it's practically rote at this point. Easy pass if ever there was one."
"Hey, Zen! Hold up!"

You are spared the mercy of a reply in the conversation as Zen is interrupted by a waving snow leopard approaching you both. He and Zen clap hands twice in a brotherly secret shake. "Kirden, nice! Kirden, this is..."

You smile and wave at his face as he smiles back in excitement, a gorgeous spread of black spots against light-grey fur, but you don't catch what he's saying because you're too busy thinking about the science class from hell you just went through. It wasn't just a matter of the science being way over your head- if what Zen had told you was right, and looking at the rest of the class seemed to confirm it, then that stuff was their average, possibly even elementary, and it was waaaay over the head of anything you'd heard of on Earth, let alone studied. They learn quantum mechanics as cubs?

You look around you at the passing students- a lemur in a skirt, a male bunny in some skin-tight exercise gear, a pony covered in gaudy prep attire, a horse in casual shorts, shirt and sandals. You then look up at Kirden and Zen, distantly aware of them laughing at some joke you didn't catch.

It's always been surreal, being around giants so casually stronger than you, but knowing they're casually smarter than you too only enhances the distorted, dreamlike quality of it. You feel like you're in a nightmare, like a bug in a pantheon. They haven't changed their sizes, but now they don't have to. Now, you feel much, much smaller, all on your own.

You only hope you can bridge the gap.
15122112212.title: The anthros' science is far too complicated...

1512212.content: human im impresed you scored prity high even though the scoring was revised you got...
1512212.title: You actually scored very well

152.content:
You are having that horrible vision again, the one of the human pound. Since there are so many humans strays nowadays, your life had been one of monotony and fear, among millions of others with you. So many humans were at the pound, they had to be kept at dangerously small sizes in order to fit them all. Everything was huge and dangerous. During feeding time, the ten thousand others along with you would share a single bread crumb and one drop of water, the anthros there were so cheap. You all swarmed around the bland sustenance like ants, although you were much more insignificant than an ant. It would take all of your strength just to break the surface tension of that drop of water. But worst of all was the lack of feeling everyone had; you felt like less than a speck of pink dust next to those pound owners.

Your owner hears your whimpering. Slowly, she sticks a black furry hand into your cage and rubs your back. Yes, your owner did change your life for the better. You remember the day she came to the pound and first looked at you through that magnifying glass. She must have been an anthro fox from heaven, that eye was so caring and friendly. For the first time in your life, you felt loved.

Now that she owns you, she is allowed to make you bigger. You feel much safer and respected at your current height of nine inches. Suddenly, the velvet curtain is lifted from your cage, revealing an unfamiliar room. You see empty cages of varying sizes near you, and you notice that they are all on a table, not on the ground. You are nervous about the striking warmness and colors of the room, but when your fox owner speaks to you, you feel comforted.

"So, Dusty, this is my classroom. We're going to be in here five days a week, so have a good look and get comfortable. The students will be here very soon, so don't be frightened when they come through that door." Your master, who is apparantly a schoolteacher, points to a big door with a little window on it. On the bottom, you see a cute poster of an anthro dog holding a little human boy in his paw and petting him. You wish that you could read what was written below that comforting image.

Sure enough, the door starts opening several times, each time revealing a new anthro. All of the young giants start to sit down at chairs with tables attached to them, and they all look at you on your table. You like having this attention; it is much better than being ignored. As the last of the anthros walks in, you notice that they are all...
152.title: Remembrance of a Bleak Past

1522.content:
All of the anthros look fully grown, but still exude youthfulness. You guess that they are eighteen or nineteen, about six or seven years older than you. You are a bit glad that they aren't little kids, who tend to be a bit jumpy and excited around pet humans and are more prone to unfortunate accidents. You note that the desks are arranged in a circle, letting you see all the different kinds of anthros clearly. Most of the ten teenagers are furry, but some are scaly or otherwise.

Suddenly, the lid of your cage lifts, and you are scooped up in your owner's paws. The kind anthro fox walks among the students, who often reach out to pat you, as she addresses them.

"Welcome back to the second half of Human Care, everyone. As you can see, we will be working with a live human now, instead of figurines, so everything you learned earlier this year must be practiced when handling him. His name is Dusty, and he's been living with me for one month. He can talk, but he is very quiet and will only talk when he is very comfortable with someone. Otherwise, you will all find Dusty to be affectionate and loyal, as long as you act respectfully back."

After being scratched playfully on the head by a giant lioness anthro, your owner travels back to her desk, where she shrinks you down to three inches tall and places you in a cage with a cushy bean bag inside. You know that you will be spending lots of your time with the students, and from the way that nearly all of them reached out to pet you, you feel like you are going to enjoy being in this classroom.

Your master continued talking to the students. "For the second semester, there are no tests or essays, only hands-on projects. Twenty five percent of your grades will come from group in-class projects with Dusty, and seventy five percent will come from one-on-one projects with Dusty. These one-on-ones will happen every day after in the order we have decided on at the beginning of class, and each of you must attend all three of your assigned dates, or you will be dropped from the class. In order to earn your human ownership licenses, you must score at least a ninety overall."

You do not know what it means to have a one-on-one. Will this mean that your owner won't be there to protect you if something goes wrong? Suddenly, the cage door opens, and you are caressed by soft black fingers. Surely your master won't allow any harm to come your way. The friendly digits lift your fragile frame up and place you in a padded palm. Your master carries you into the center of the circle, where she begins her first lesson with you.
1522.title: Responsible Young Adults

15221.content:
You feel yourself growing as the class pays full attention to the teacher and your master. You are first lying in her palm, then her whole hand, then in both hands, and finally cradled in her arms.

"As you are all aware class, humans have the amazing ability to change size at another's will. Can anyone tell me what is so special about the size Dusty is right now? You see many anthro arms shoot into the air, and your owner chooses an anthro iguana boy. "That is the largest size that humans can get to."

"Very good, Iggy. Remember that if you try to make a human larger, it will only put strain on its body and cause it much discomfort. Now, can anyone tell me the smallest size a human can be?" Much fewer anthros raised their paws or claws this time. "Yes, Gladys?"

"One quarter of an inch?" the anthro capybara girl. "Sorry, that's wrong, Gladys, but you do make a good point that I will mention very soon. Actually, there is no smallest size that a human can be. Allow me to demonstrate, but keep in mind that this should only be attempted by or with the help of a professional human handler."

You suddenly become very fearful as you seem to collapse downward. You suddenly stop at one inch, and your master carries you to the tip of one of her black fingerpads before you continue your descent. Inches become feet, then yards, then miles as you find yourself on a barren wasteland of blackness surrounded by fur many times thicker than trees. You fear this size greatly, it is even smaller than the size you have lived at most of your life. Fortunately, you remain that way for only a few seconds before you quickly shoot back up to a more substantial quarter inch. The powerful black finger tilts slightly, causing you to roll safely into your owner's waiting palm.

"As you can see, it is very easy for an overly enthusiastic anthro to shrink a human to unimaginably small sizes. However, you all surely noticed that the human disappeared from view, and this is why a quarter inch is set as the minimum recommended height that humans be kept at. Now, what two things control the shrinking of a human?"

This time, every one of the fifteen anthro teens raise their hands. Your owner calls on the anthro lioness.

"Desire and focus. Humans shrink whenever you want them to as long as you think about them shrinking hard enough."

"Correct, Leona, I couldn't have said it better myself. Now, would someone like to come up and practice shrinking and growing Dusty?"

Not only did everyone raise their hands again, but they all seemed very eager to shrink you. You hope that whoever participates isn't overly enthusiastic, because you really don't want to become that small again. You are hoping a little for Leona, because she seemed to be the most friendly when petting you. However, the teacher picks someone else.
15221.title: Size Spectrum

choices: Stella, the female anthro fruit bat
152212.content:
Stella gets up from her seat and slowly makes her way to the center of the desk circle. By the look of her large pupils in her eyes and fuzzy nose, you reason that she is a fruit bat. Her huge wings are relaxed and folded over her back and lower body like a cape. You note that her stiff oversized bat ears have many earrings that are larger than you at your current size. Your master gently empties you into Stella's waiting palms, which are covered in very soft chocolate-brown fur.

As Stella strokes your body gently with a black painted claw over three times your size, your owner instructs her through the process. "Okay, Stella, first I would like you to grow Dusty to one foot, the maximum size, while putting as little strain on his body as you can." Her huge eyes seem to peer into your soul as she focus on your growth. You slowly start to fill the bat's soft palm, but you notice that the left side of your body feels a bit heavier than your right. This feels very weird, so you start to sway a bit in discomfort, clutching your slightly warped head.

"Oh no, did I hurt him?" cried out Stella, immediately stopping your growth. As your body evens out on its own, your fox master comforts Stella. "You're doing fine for a first time, Stella. Try to focus more on how large you want him to be in the end, not necessarily on the growth itself." Once again, you started growing, and this time it went much smoother; almost as smooth as if your owner had done it herself. You did not even feel the strain that your master was talking about. You now found yourself supported in the fruit bats arms, which are much bonier than your master's, but not uncomfortable. Stella seemed to be a bit fearful of your safety and rested your head in her palm as if it was as fragile as a soap bubble.

"Excellent work! Now try to shrink him back to one quarter inch. It's okay if you go too far on the first try, this is very common. Just make sure that you are supporting his body in one hand and you will not cause him any bodily harm."

Despite her teacher's words, Stella looked quite nervous, as did you. Now you are sure that you are going to end up at a scarily small size, and Stella seems very fearful of hurt you accidentally. You feel yourself shrink in tiny bursts, which make you slightly dizzy. After reaching four inches, you are scooped up into the soft brown palm once more. Stella looked on the verge of tears as she focused on keeping you shrinking safely. You shrink smaller and smaller, yet the fur of her hand does not grow coarser. Once as thick as her little finger, you suddenly start shooting down faster, and Stella cries out in fear. This frightens you as well, and the slight twitch in her hand causes you to fall over in a small heap. You curl up a bit, fearful that you may fall, but you are still safe, even though you are much smaller than a quarter inch. You hear loud clapping coming from the other students and heavy panting coming from the fruit bat, but you do not look up, since you do not want to know how small you are. You then feel a familiar black pad against your back and you grow to one inch before returning to your owner's safe paws.

"Thank you very much, Stella, and you really did not do bad at all. If you can stay calm and focused when changing a human's size, I'm sure that you could be an expert someday." Stella managed to crack a smile at you and your owner before wrapping her wings a bit tighter around her skinny body. Suddenly, you hear a loud ringing, and you figure that the class must be over for today.

"Well, that's all the time we have for today; I will see you all tomorrow on Tuesday."
You see fourteen of the fifteen young adult pack up their things and leave the class, but one of them remains. You suddenly remember that you are supposed to have one-on-ones with a student every day, but you still do not know what that means. Whatever it is, the student on the first day is...
152212.title: Ideal Volunteer

choices: She wants to shrink you correctly
She just wants to have a close look at you
1522122.content:
The nervous skinny bat girl remains in her seat, looking at everyone leave, but mostly at you tiny body in your owner's palm. Oddly, you are not nearly as afraid now as you thought you would be. Your master brings you to your desk and starts to talk about what a one-on-one is.

"Now Dusty, you have a very important job. First of all, you will be going home with Stella overnight and returning to me in the morning." You start whimpering now, because you love your master so much, and your master consoles you with a finger pad. "I know, I know, I will miss you too. My students are all very nice, though, and I am sure that you will like staying with them." You return your love to your master by giving her finger a big hug.

"Now, on this first day, Stella will be treating you as a normal human pet, with nothing special like the other two one-on-ones. However, it is your job to pay close attention whenever Stella does something with you. You will tell me how good of a job she did caring for you Tuesday morning, and I will determine her first project's grade from what you tell me."

Your master lowers you into your traveling cage, designed for a one inch human and colored bright red so it cannon get lost. Stella comes to your owner's desk and picks up a sheet of paper. You wish you could read what was on that paper! After stuffing the paper into her bag, she picks up your cage next. Even when you are safe in your cage, the fruit bat still handles you like a priceless treasure, her movements slow and purposeful as her brown furry palms cup around your cage. Through the thin body fingers you wave goodbye to your master, both sad and excited.

Before long, you were one hundred feet in the air as Stella flapped her black wings through the afternoon air. Her huge eyes were directed forward, but very often glances back at you whenever you make the slightest movement. You feel very safe with the young bat woman, and only wish that she was more confident in her ability. You suddenly see her heading for a tall apartment building, and she descends as smoothly as she can before landing right outside the penthouse. Drawing a key larger than your cage from her pants pocket, Stella unlocks the door and steps into the apartment.

You are astounded by the new sights and sounds. Stella starts by walking to a bowl filled with nice smelling colorful objects you have never seen before, and plucks a red one and takes a big bite out of it. You realize that this must be fruit. You have never eaten such a thing before; your master feeds you canned human food, and you only ate bread and water at the pound.

In the other room, there is a chubby fruit bat man with graying fur hanging from a pipe on the ceiling. "I'm, home, Grandpa!" Stella calls out to the sleeping fruit bat before heading off to her room. Placing your cage softly on a desk near her bed, she takes the sheet of paper out of her bag and starts to read it. Her wide pupils seem to go wider as she reads what must have something to do with taking care of you. After a few minutes, she places the paper down and pops open your cage with a black painted claw. As gently as ever, you were lifted onto her palm, and with intense focus in her eyes, you grow to eight inches. As you look into those huge bat eyes, lying in her velvety soft hands, you wonder what Stella is going to do with you.
1522122.title: Stella's First Project

15221221.content:
Stella started talking very softly, speaking words meant to soothe. "It's okay, Dusty, Stella's got you, you are safe with me." You start to feel nervous, since you start to shrink very slowly. You know that Stella wants to shrink you correctly this time, based on how upset she was that she overdid it in front of the students. She seems much calmer now as you shrink an inch every few minutes; perhaps Stella was nervous because she was in front of a lot of other students. You are gently stroked by Stella's seemingly weightless black claw as you descend. All the while your student partner never ceases in comforting you with her words. "Don't be afraid, little human, I won't hurt you, not ever."

Very lightly, you are slid into a single hand as your body diminishes. Stella keeps her huge head close to your body, her wide pupils unmoving and unblinking. As you approach one inch, your growth starts to slow even more. Stella's soft speech turns to a faint whisper, her warm breath blowing gently against your face. Her luxuriously soft brown fur starts to rise noticably around your legs as you shrink, and her large claw that once patted just your head now lightly rubbed your whole back at once. And then, all of a sudden, the shrinking stopped.

"There, there, tiny Dusty, you did a great job!" Stella seemed to be congratulating herself more as she admired your quarter-inch body lying in her palm. Slowly, you rose upward as Stella lightly cuddled you against her cheek. You are very proud of Stella and only think that she is still too gentle with you. You decide to reward her by returning her cuddle as best as you can, embracing her soft cheek with your whole body. You think that she gets the message a bit, since her palm presses down just a tiny bit harder, though your owner's hugs are still much firmer and enjoyable than Stella's.

You spend the next hour or so with Stella in her room as she writes things down on lined paper and flips through thick books. Your fruit bat pal keeps you on her furry shoulder, often pausing to give you a little pat with her finger. You do not know what she is doing with the papers, but the way she is treating you reminds you of some stories some of the older humans told you about in the pound. They claimed to be "lap humans" at some point in their lives. Such a life sounded enjoyable but would likely be boring if it lasted your whole life. Apparently, some anthros keep humans just to pet and pamper all the time. Personally you enjoy a more active lifestyle. Every other day you go with your master on a walk to the park, which is equivalent to a few miles a day. She also taught you some games, like rolling a marble between you and your fox owner.

"Well, my homework is done now, Dusty, so I guess that it's time to check what I should do now." As she gets out her sheet of paper from Human Care class, you have a familiar feeling in your tiny tummy.
15221221.title: Shrinking Success

choices: Plastic Basin (bad for Dusty, who can't swim)
152212211.content:
Your tummy growls a bit, and Stella's huge ears twitch towards you. Stella giggles very softly, and says, "Of course, silly me, I have to feed you! You can eat while I do, okay?" You still do not feel comfortable talking to Stella, but you do respond by hopping into her open palm, which is as comfy as a mattress. Stella grows you to five inches before opening her door and heading to the table with all of the fruit on it. Unexpectedly, at least to you, the older fruit bat is sitting there waiting, and speaks in an odd European accent to his granddaughter.

"Finally! Kids these days get too much homework! Now, Stella, I picked up some durians and some grapes...," the elder bat suddenly stops as his eyes widen, reminding you remarkably of Stella herself. "Where did you get that human?"

Stella looks down at your confused face, and then back at the other bat. "He's my project for Human Care. His name is Dusty, and he needs to eat like us, so I was going to feed him some grapes."

The elder bat did not look too happy. "Well, I don't get what's so special about humans nowadays for them to be a topic in school. Back in my day, humans were just pets that little kids kept around. Most kids your age would be more interested in a boyfriend or a girlfriend. Did I ever tell you that your grandma had a soft spot for humans?"

"Yes you did, Grandpa," said Stella, a bit annoyed. You are a little sad; you would have liked to hear the story of an anthro who loved humans. Setting you on a tablecloth opposite from her grandfather, Stella took out a long knife and started carving an huge, spiny, tan fruit that smelled very odd. You hope that you are not going to eat any of that fruit as she passes half to her guardian and placed the other half on her plate. Thankfully, she reaches back into the fruit basket and takes out a small green fruit that must be a "grape". Stella places the grape next to you and gives you a little tickle before she starts to politely eat her "durian".

You find it very hard to pierce the skin of the grape. You try biting it, but it is too smooth and your teeth just slide off. You start to moan, which causes the grandfather bat to look a bit annoyed. Stella seems much more understanding, and pokes a small hole in the grape with one of her black claws. Surprisingly, a lot of juice comes out and sprays your whole face. You lick your lips, and you realize how delicious the grape really is. It has a taste that you have never witnessed before, coupled with a slight tartness. You squeal in delight as you bring the grape to your head and rip off some of the delicious pulp.

"Looks like your Dusty has a sweet tooth, Stella!" the old bat laughed after swallowing some of his durian. Stella laughed with him. So, this flavor is called "sweet". You will definitely want to talk to your master about this delicious taste tomorrow.

As you continue wolfing down your grape, you see Stella has finished her durian half. She grabs a handful of grapes and starts popping them in her mouth. You thought it was neat that you were eating the same thing as an anthro; your master would never touch your canned human food. Eventually, you start to feel very full, and your grape is only half eaten. You decide that Stella can have the rest, so you carry the green fruit to her finger and poke it a bit. "Why, thank you Dusty, that is very kind of you!" says your temporary owner as she slurps up the last of your grape. Wiping her mouth with a napkin, she picks you up and starts to carry you away. "Okay, Grandpa, now I have to clean Dusty; its in the instructions Miss Vixen gave me."

You soon find yourself in Stella's washroom. There is a bath/shower combo and a sink; nothing out of the ordinary. However, you do hope that your real master told Stella that you can't swim and need to be washed appropriately. Pets don't wear clothes, so you are ready to be washed whenever Stella is. You notice that she is reaching for a...
152212211.title: Sweet, Sweet Fruit

choices: It is still night time, and Stella wants to play with you before bed
It is the morning, and time to get ready for school
1522122111.content:
Stella grabs a big yellow sponge, and after growing you to ten inches, she places you in the sink. You are very impressed that the bat knows how you need to get cleaned: at a large size so you do not get swept down the drain. Dampening the sponge a bit, Stella grabs an equally large bar of soap and starts to work a fine lather. Finally, she starts to clean your sticky, grapey body. Her touch is still extremely gentle; the sponge barely touches you, but you are getting covered in suds. Soon, you are completely encased in bubbles and cannot see, but you feel the bat student's long slender fingers rub your body. Each of your limbs gets scrubbed between two brown fingers, and your chest and back gently massaged by three. Stella is especially gentle near your most sensitive parts, touching them more lightly than you thought possible for someone so large.

You suddenly feel like you are shrinking, and the palm you are in opens up a bit more. Through the bubbles you can make out the sponge again, and before you know it you are rinsed by a cascade of warm water as your student owner squeezes the sponge. All of the bubbles wash away, now replaced only by damp brown hand fur. You are set down on a hand towel and completely wrapped loosely in its folds. You are dried fully, as are Stella's hands, which return to pick you back up. Feeling clean and warm, you snuggle a bit against the bat's warm palm as she carries you back to your cage. She shrinks you to one inch and places you inside, then returns to her washroom, probably to clean herself now.

The warmness, the friendliness, the expertise, you think about how well Stella did taking care of you today, and definitely hope that she gets a very good grade based on what you tell your owner. The only flaw was that she could have been a little firmer when handling you. Right now, the safety of your little red cage, the little cotton ball that supports you in the cage, and the sound of rushing water coming from the washroom makes you feel sleepy. You fall sound asleep, and do not wake up until Stella lightly taps on your cage.
1522122111.title: Washed by a Bat

choices: How to discipline misbehaving pet humans
Safe games to play with pet humans
15221221112.content:
"Wake up, Dusty, I want you to have your breakfast before we fly back to school!" You wake up groggily to a pair of huge bat eyes and two fingers pinching a juicy orange piece of fruit. Slowly getting up, you accept the breakfast and take a bite. "I hope you like orange, Dusty!" said Stella as she gently gathered your cage in her hands. As you start to leave and Stella waves goodbye to her grandpa, the sweet tang of the orange fills your mouth, making you feel more awake. Stella's ride to school is very smooth, and the crisp morning breeze wakes you up more as you finish the orange piece.

When Stella lands, your ride gets unexpectedly bumpy as the fruit bat runs into the school and down the halls. You can tell that she is trying to be as steady as she can, but nobody can be perfectly gentle while running. You wonder why as Stella bursts into the classroom, where you see your beloved owner.

"Miss Vixen, I'm so sorry I'm late, its just that my grandpa needed me to clean up a mess in the kitchen this morning, and I didn't want to hurt Dusty by flying too fast."

"Calm down, Stella, everything is fine, now just give me Dusty and I will see you this afternoon." Stella gently placed your cage in your master's hand, and your world changed from chocolate brown to jet black. As quick as a wink, your bat friend was gone, and now you and your owner are alone. Opening your cage and placing you on your bean bag, your master addresses you. "Well, Dusty, you look very happy today. I know that you don't like to talk, but I need to hear what you think about Stella. You can take your time if you're not ready."

You surprise your owner by speaking right away. It always surprises your owner whenever you speak to her; its as if she can't believe that someone other than an anthro has the ability to talk. You tell your master all about how gentle and caring Stella was, how she fed you fruit, and how she remembered to wash you correctly. You also mention that she was just a little to bit too careful when handling you and would have been better if she was more intimate with you and confident in herself. Your master jots all of this down on a giant sheet of paper, and, of course, you can't read a word of it. However, you know that Stella is getting a high mark by reading your master's facial expressions while you speak. Her fox mouth was curled into a smile the whole time, and made many "aww" sounds while you spoke.

The rest of the morning and the start of the afternoon were pretty uneventful. Your master spent a lot of time in what she called a "teacher's lounge" and often brought you with her while she worked on writing on papers and drinking coffee. You were brought to six inches high for lunch, which consisted of your human food, which doesn't seem nearly as exciting as fruit. You do get some exercise when your master grows you to nine inches and walks you back to the classroom. Before class starts, your fox master lovingly plays the "bounce" game with you, in which you shrink to six inches and are bounced lightly on your master's furry knee.

Eventually, you are back in one of your cages as the familiar students come back. You smile when Stella enters, looking much more relaxed than she did this morning. You wonder what today's lesson is going to be.
15221221112.title: A Bit of a Hurry

choices: Xi Lin, the female Eastern dragon anthro
152212211121.content:
"Welcome back, class," begins your fox owner. "As all of you know, humans can be very clever, and are thought to be very close to us anthros in intelligence. Therefore, it is very important when dealing with a human that you repeatedly let the human know that your its master and has to obey you; otherwise they might take advantage over you."

You are a little frightened of what your master is saying, but you know that your master has never hurt you, and therefore definitely won't teach the students to deal with misbehaving humans through shock.

"Now, class, can anyone tell me some acceptable ways to deal with a human after it misbehaves?" asks your master, picking up a white stick in her paw. All of the students raise their arms, and Miss Vixen calls on the iguana.

"Spanking," says Iggy, without batting an eye. However, you wince at the word; you have never heard it, but it sounds nasty. "Yes, Iggy, spanking is one way, but recall that the intentional harming of a human should only be administered in the most extreme of cases." Your master writes some unintelligible words on the blackboard before calling on another reptilian, this one resembling a serpentine dragon.

"Confinement," replies the Eastern dragon girl. "Very good, Xi Lin, that's one of the more effective ways to deal with a misbehaving human," says your master. "Recall that humans are very social creatures, so leaving them in their cage is very likely to teach them rules." You notice that fewer anthros are raising their hands now, as the teacher now calls on Hogan.

"Humans learn best through demonstration and encouragement.," snorted the anthropomorphic peccary. "When a human misbehaves, the owner is responsible for making sure that the human understands that what it did was wrong, and should then show them how to make it right. Once the human has realized its error and corrected it on its own, the owner should be supportive and reward the human, so it will be encouraged to behave right." You are impressed at the hog-like male's knowledge, but the other students just seem to stare at him and roll their eyes. You guess that they think that Hogan is trying to show off.

After your teacher finishes writing on the board, she popped your cage open and plucked out your three-inch frame. "Now, suppose Dusty just threw his food on the floor. Can someone show me how to properly discipline Dusty?" Once again, all of the students are eager to interact with you. You are hoping for Stella, because she would definitely be gentle with you. Hogan also might seem nice, although his trotters look a little clumsy. However, your master chooses...
152212211121.title: Disciplining Human Pets

1522122111211.content:
You feel unsafe as the giant reptile rises from his seat to discipline you. You try to back up against your master's safe paw, but it still lowers you into Iggy's scaly palm. His green skin is rough with little give, but still somewhat warm. For some reason, you were expecting his hand to be ice-cold.

As Iggy starts to lower his other palm towards you, your owner speaks, "No, Iggy, I want you to use the technique of demonstration and encouragement." Iggy sighs, and starts to speak sternly. "Dusty, you naughty human, don't ever throw your food on the floor!" His huge pointer finger is wagging at you, and you are frightened that you will get impaled on that sharp claw. "Now, I want you to pick up that food right away!" the iguana shouted, pointing to the floor. You are lowered to the floor a bit jerkily, but since there is no food there, you don't know what to do now. You look at your master, who in turn gestures for you to look back at Iggy, who towers over you now and looks a bit menacing when he bends over you.

"Iggy, you need to show Dusty what to do with the 'food'," you hear your master whisper to the giant iguana. Iggy gets down on one knee and pretends to pick up something in his claws. "This food, Dusty, I want you to pick it up off the floor yourself now and throw it in the garbage can!" After Iggy puts the imaginary food down, you hope that you are doing the right thing when you go over to where the 'food' is and lifting it over your head. Suddenly, two claws close on either side of you and lift you up to the top of the garbage bin. You wait for something to happen, when Iggy says impatiently, "Go ahead, throw it in." He then seems to have a brainstorm, then makes a throwing motion with his other hand. You try to imitate him, making that motion towards the bin. You know that you have done something right when you here polite applause coming from the other students and your master. Iggy gives your tiny head a little pat before dumping you back into your master's waiting paws.

Now that class was over, you start to wonder what will happen today. Yesterday, that nice bat girl kept you, and you hope that the projects happen three days in a row per student so you can be with her again. However, Stella was also the anthro that demonstrated shrinking yesterday. Since Iggy demonstrated today, there was a chance that he would be your keeper for the rest of the day. You don't want that to happen, since Iggy acts roughly and scares you, even though you don't really think he will actually hurt you. Sure enough, the student that remains in the classroom at the end of the day is...
1522122111211.title: Roughness

choices: Your owner is right when she thinks Iggy's going to be kind.
15221221112112.content:
You cringe in fear, seeing Iggy staying in the classroom. Then you're going to spend a whole afternoon and night with that rough teen!

To make your fears worse, the last two students who're leaving the classroom are chatting together on the door in a low voice, but not low enough to not be heard: "Poor Dusty, he's going to be alone with Iggy..." "Yeah, poor little creature, who knows what could happen to him in the hands of that jock!"

Iggy, hearing those words while he's writing on some papers, snorts toward his two classmates, who hurry out of the room.
They looked nervous at the idea of having Iggy angry at them, that doesn't speak well, in your opinion, about the iguana's behaviour. How have the two students called him? A word like... "jock"? What's a jock, you wonder. That's one of the many words you still don't know... It suddenly dawns on you that Iggy seems to be the tallest and biggest student in his class, could that be the meaning of that strange word? You suppose his size and strength are actually involved, but there must be more... judging by how Iggy and his classmates acted, a jock should be nothing good.

You shiver in fear at the idea, and your owner feels your uneasiness, because she gingerly lifts you before her muzzle, talking to you in a comforting voice. "Don't worry, Dusty, I know Iggy can look mean and scary, but he's actually a kind boy, he's just too used to handle things in a rough way. Considering that you're just a little helpless creature which needs help and protection, he certainly is going to treat you very gentle... am I right, Iggy?"
She turns toward the iguana with a frown, and Iggy nods, a little absent-minded, that doesn't calm you down a bit.

But unlike you, your master seems convinced that you aren't in danger, and after a few minutes you find yourself shrunken again to one inch, locked in the red cage and carried by Iggy's titanic hand, whose sight is enough to frighten you.
15221221112112.title: Iggy's First Project

choices: You don't get hurt any more
Iggy accidently twists your ankle while handling you
152212211121122.content:
Traveling with Iggy is not a pleasant experience. He swings his arms as he walks, which means you are being jostled around a lot in your cage. If it wasn't for the cottony padding, you'd be covered in bruises. His scaly hand is also completely concealing your cage, which means that you can't tell where you are going either. You are not sure, but since the young iguana man doesn't seem to be going into a car or anything, he might live at the school. Your master said that most students live in places around the school called 'dorm rooms', and if that means that you will spend less time traveling in this way, you hope that Iggy reaches his dorm room soon.

The trip indeed is pretty short, and you assume that you are right. However, you have no time to recover from the journey, as Iggy immediately pops open your cage and dumps you onto his huge green palm as soon as you get there. You start to feel yourself grow, and eventually your body starts to feel tense and achy as your temporary owner overzealously keeps your body trying to grow a bit past one foot. Now your body is squeezed in a great reptilian fist, and Iggy is staring at you with an unusually happy look on his face.

"Finally, now I can have a good look at you, Dusty," says the iguana in a taunting kind of voice. Two large claws pinch your arm, and as he compares how flimsy they are compared to his, you feel very uncomfortable. You squirm around, trying to loosen your captor's grasp, but to no avail.

"No, Dusty, don't move a muscle," commands Iggy in his frightening stern voice. As you feel your arm start to bend the wrong way, you desparately pound on one of his knuckles with your free hand. The iguana does not loosen his grip on your body, but he does release your arm. However, he sounds furious now.

"Dusty, no hitting your owner!" he shouts. "If you aren't going to do what I say, I'm going to have to teach you a lesson!" You immediately start to shrink very quickly; in only two seconds you reach three inches. Iggy lays your body face down on a wooden surface, pressing your whole upper body down with two huge fingertips and pinning your legs with a third. Then, you experience a horrible pain as something hard comes into contact with your rump. The pain comes back a second time, and your howls of pain are muffled by the wood surface you're being pressed against. The third strike is the most painful, probably because your bottom was sore from the first two strikes. Now that you finally realize what 'spanking' is, you wish that you never have to go through it again.

The fingers lift off of you, but you stay face down, fearful of looking at Iggy. "Get up, Dusty," speaks the frightening voice. Despite your soreness, you get up anyway, not wanting to anger Iggy any more and get more spankings. You look up at Iggy, who speaks softer now but still sternly. "Now, we'll try this again. I just want to look at what I'm dealing with here, and if you don't resist what I do, then you won't get hurt, got it?"

You do not dare speak to Iggy, but you do walk closer to him in hopes that he will get the message. Sure enough, you grow to one foot once again, this time not experiencing nearly as much pain caused by overgrowing, and Iggy closes his scaly fist around you once more. You hope that Iggy will at least keep his word and not hurt you if you try to cooperate.
152212211121122.title: Different Kind of Master

choices: Iggy returns one hour later with a pizza
Iggy returns three hours later, very tired
1522122111211221.content:
As Iggy reaches for your arm once more, you try to make it go completely limp, as you don't want to give him any reason to think you are resisting him. When he pinches your thin arm and starts moving it around, it feels very odd and uncomfortable. Thankfully, he has no intention of snapping it off, and after a few seconds he moves on to one of your legs. You feel a little bit like your going to your vet, except Dr. Purr is much gentler when handling you. You wonder if Iggy has any interest of being a human veterinarian.

"Well, I guess your just a total wimp, then, Dusty," spat Iggy as he shrunk you to half an inch. You are worried that that means you have a dangerous disease, but by the way Iggy is acting, being a 'wimp' is hopefully not a serious condition. Tossing you into your cage and shutting it tight, Iggy gets up and leaves you alone in his dorm room.

You feel very neglected after a few hours without company, even the company of a kind-of mean iguana. Iggy did not do a very good job of caring for you so far, at least you think. You are barely big enough to not be able to slip through your cage bars, so you can do nothing until Iggy comes back. You hope he does soon, as you are getting pretty hungry.
1522122111211221.title: Uneasy, but Unhurt

choices: Iggy awakens panicked in the morning when he realizes he didn't feed you.
Iggy wakes you when he grabs your cage and walks straight to class.
15221221112112212.content:
It's not until much later that the huge door of the dorm room swings open and a tired looking Iggy staggers into the room. His eyes look glazed over and his coordination seems impaired. He does not even notice you, and immediately rushes into his bathroom to do something that sounds disgusting. You then hear the sound of a flushing toilet, then rushing water as his shower turns on.

Your empty stomach growls, and you moan. Iggy is not being a very good master at all, and you are going to have to tell your master all about this tomorrow. Hopefully, she will expel Iggy from the class if he is this irresponsible. Maybe then you won't have to worry about Iggy ever again.

A little later, the huge iguana swings the bathroom door open and collapses on his bed. You whine audibly, hoping that he will give you something to eat before he falls asleep, but Iggy just grumbles and buries his scaly head into his pillow. You search the cottony folds of your cage, and manage to find a few minute bread crumbs and devour them greedily. Now, unfortunately, there is nothing left to do but sleep, and hope that tomorrow is a better day.
15221221112112212.title: Neglected

choices: He must be expelled from the class.
He has to get 100% on both his remaining projects in order to not fail.
152212211121122122.content:
You awaken with a jolt as Iggy grabs your cage off his countertop. You do not even get to see the light of day, as his scaly hand is completely wrapped around your traveling cage. Immediately noticing your lightheadedness, you weakly poke the dark green wall of Iggy's finger, hoping that you will get any sort of food at all. The iguana doesn't even seem to notice you.

After an uncomfortable swaying trek, you finally hear the voice of your real master, and immediately feel better. "Good morning, Iggy, and how did it go with Dusty?"

"It went pretty well. I think it likes me, actually," Iggy lied. You are angry, and can't wait to tell your master the truth about this big bully. Setting your cage in a falsely gentle way, Iggy left the classroom.

Your master carefully opened your cage and emptied you out on her palm. Immediately, she sensed something was wrong. "Oh dear, Dusty, you look so pale and thin! Did Iggy forget to feed you breakfast?"

You spill the beans, alerting your master to the fact that not only did the iguana not feed you at all, but didn't clean you or spend any time with you, except when he took you out and did very painful things to you. Your master looks shocked; she immediately gives you a human treat to tide you over until lunch, and actually sounds like she is trying not to weep.

You finish, and you are exhausted by the effort of just talking to your vulpine owner. Growing you to four inches, she cups you in her palms and snuggles you, in the hopes of cheering you up. It does help a little bit, and you try cuddling back against her soft black palm to let her know that. After the much needed cuddle, your owner tells you what she thinks about Iggy.
152212211121122122.title: Finally Back

choices: Play a game with all the students
Quiet bonding time with all the students
1522122111211221222.content:
"Well, Dusty, you'll be glad to know that Iggy is not going to pass unless he is absolutely perfect on his other two projects with you." You feel a bit down, because this means that you'll have to face Iggy at least one more time, but your owner strokes you lovingly. "Don't worry about Iggy, he's going to get a stern talking to after school today. Plus, you won't have to be with him for a few weeks." This cheers you up, and you actually thank her in words.

Your master gives you a double serving of your canned human food for lunch, and you down it all. Never has the blandish healthy slop tasted so good to you. You wash it down with nearly half a pint of water; you must have become dehydrated as well during that stay. Your owner notices a sweaty stink on you and remembers that you haven't been washed yesterday either. Taking you to the teachers' private restroom, she takes your special sponge-brush out and gives you a good scrubbing after increasing your size to a foot. You always love your owner's baths; they are so relaxing, and she uses just the right amount of abrasiveness against your frail body.

Full, clean, and refreshed, you await the students' arrival into the classroom at a height of two inches. Your master looks unusually happy, and you poke her finger to get an explanation for why. "Well, Dusty, today is Wednesday, and I know you're going to like what you're going to do with the students on Wednesdays."
1522122111211221222.title: Fixed Up

15221221112112212222.content:
"On Wednesdays, the students get the period free to bond with you, Dusty. It's a nice relaxed way to develop the relationship between human and anthro." You look worried, but your master calms you, "Don't worry, I'll be watching the class the whole time."

The students walk in and most look excited; they obviously look forward to Wednesday free time. Iggy looks dejected, though, and another anthro, a pit bull boy almost as buff looking as Iggy, doesn't seem too thrilled at all. Everyone else looks at you lovingly as you sit on your owner's desk.

"Okay, class, Dusty is yours for the next hour. Iggy, while everyone else has their free time, I believe we have to talk."

You almost fear that Iggy is going to pick you up as he walks over to the desk, but thankfully, a rather chipper capybara girl, Gladys, performs that task. She unexpectedly gave your three inch body a little kiss before bringing you to the other students, an unusual uncomfortable experience given her oversized buck teeth.

"So, Dusty, see you survived the day with Iggy," whinnied a zebra boy, his mane dyed many shocking colors. "I know, Zack, he's one lucky human!" Gladys agreed, cuddling you in her arms. "Must have been torture, little dude," replied Zack. He stroked your body with a thick hooflike finger, and you enjoyed the sympathy of the anthros surrounding you.

"Gladys, let me inspect Dusty to see if there's any damage," offered Hogan. The large rodent's nimble paws appeared to shrink as you sprouted a few inches, and she placed you in the peccary's large trotters. His curious eyes inspected your frail exposed body closely. "He's underfed and has been handled too roughly, but he's surprisingly well off. He's better off than I was when I crossed Iggy three weeks ago..."

Suddenly a soft golden padded paw grabbed you and cradled you as Leona tried to console you. "Aww, I feel so sorry for you, little Dusty. Spending a whole day with that meanie." Her grip was very firm but gentle; it even rivaled that of your master's. She held you and rocked you for a while as the students talked about how fortunate you were to survive the day with Iggy. After a while, though, Stella spoke something that piqued your interest.

"Say, Wilbur, you've been very quiet. Don't you feel sorry for what Dusty has gone through?"

The pit bull stuttered in a deep voice, "Um, yes, yes, sure, of course." He looked pretty nervous.

"You look a bit upset, Wilbur. Maybe you'd like a turn holding Dusty?" Leona asked. She approached the dog with you thrust out, and the pit bull backed away, staring at you. "No thanks, I'm fine, really," he said before letting out a little canine whine.

"Okay, if you say so," the lioness answered, handing you over to Stella instead. Stella smiled and beckoned everyone over. As they watched, Stella focused and started shrinking you. You ended up at exactly one quarter inch without experiencing any ; Stella wanted to show her prowess with size changing you.

"Wow, Stella, you've improved a whole lot!" said Hogan and Gladys, almost at the same time. Stella petted you with a huge brown finger, and you hugged it back to congratulate her. Almost everyone awwwed in unison; that is, everyone except Wilbur, who had a look of slight disgust on his fanged face.

Your master suddenly came to the group and picked you up. "Your time with Dusty is over, though I must say you all did a great job with him!" She grew you to one inch and poked you into your traveling case, before handing the case to the anthro that was keeping you today.
15221221112112212222.title: Free Time

choices: "Eww!  Get that human away from me!"
"I don't care about humans, so can you just leave me alone?"
152212211121122122222.content:
Your cage was placed into Gladys's nimble forepaws. As the capybara looked adoringly into your cage, the other students left the classroom and your master fetched a sheet of directions for Gladys. You note that Wilbur seems a bit relieved today when he leaves the room.

"Aww, Dusty, you're so cute!" whispers Gladys, her warm breath permeating your travel cage. "We're going to have so much fun, the two of us!" You like the sound of having fun with her; though she sounds a bit too into it. You hope that she doesn't accidentally injure you if she's going to be overzealous.

Fortunately, she knows to carry your case still as she walks out of the classroom. This time, you know where you are heading, as you can see the huge rodent climb a set of stairs and walk through hallways until she gets to her dormroom. When she unlocks the door, you are surprised to see someone already in there; a weasel woman jabbering on a cell phone. You don't know why she is there, but Gladys seems to know, and approaches the stranger.

"Rhonda, look who I brought!" she cries out in a sing-song voice.

"I'll call you later," the weasel woman said as she shut her phone. "What is it now, Gladys? Can't a roomie have a little privacy?"

"I'm sorry, Rhonda, it's just that I wanted to show you Dusty, the human I said I'd be taking care of today." The capybara flipped your cage open and took you out to show Rhonda, after which the weasel anthro said:
152212211121122122222.title: Gladys's First Project

choices: You wake up in the kitchen, being fed
1522122111211221222221.content:
"Eww! A human, they are vermin. I bet he's carrying diseases," Rhonda replied, she pushed you into the hand more as she made a sickly face. Gladys ignored Rhonda and took you into the kitchen; it was time for you to be fed.

"I don't know if humans eat meat, just try some." She held out a little bit of 'steak', this had an interesting taste, and was much better than the 'human food' your master gave you. You nodded and patted your stomach, this said you liked it. You were a bit too scared to talk.

"So humans are omnivores! Wow! Okay, time for a wash." Gladys grew you to about 9 1/2 inches, she was a bit scared of overgrowing you. She gentle caressed you with the sponge, this was almost the same as the way your master does it, except she did your hair in a different way, she got this fine-toothed piece of plastic and ran it through your hair. You liked this sensation, you will tell your master about this, Gladys called it combing. You couldn't make a signal which means 'I need to go', so you decided to speak.

"Err, Glad-is, I need to go to the toy-let." You asked her, she stood in shock, you spoke to her! She applauded you, then took you to a little box, similar to your owners and she looked away at what you were doing. When you had finished you signalled.

"So, Dusty, I guess you speaking to me was a one-time-thing, huh?" She seemed depressed, but she might make you talk in front of Rhonda, this time she might squish you.

"Get that hew-man outta the kitchen, I need to eat, and if he isn't outta there when I'm in there, it's human sandwich!" She seemed angry, Gladys shrunk you to an inch, and put you in the cage, she quickly, but gently, bought you into her room, this consisted of a bed, a desk, a computer, a lamp and a window, there were a few books on the desk, though you had no idea what they were about. She got out a marble and you knew the games your master had taught you, but this one would be completely different.

"Okay, Dusty you see this marble, well, you have got to roll it into this goal *she shows you her fingers making a |-| formation*, but my finger *she shows you a | inbetween her fingers* will be protecting the goal, so you got to have accuracy." You seemed to understand the rules up to the point of 'accuracy', you got handed the marble and the game began, you would get it in about 30% of the time, her finger was very quick, but this game was fun and exercising. Rhonda walked in, she seemed very angry.

"HAS THE HUMAN HAD SOME OF MY STEAK!?!" Rhonda bellowed, this shocked you, and you remember eating some of this 'steak'.

"I bought it, it isn't yours, I think Dusty should have a portion, even if it is only 5 millimeters tall." Gladys seemed to know what she was saying, but Rhonda took a swipe at you, just missing. She, then, attacks Gladys, it hits and she begins to bleed.

"Ron-duh, do not at-ack Glad-is, she did-unt do noff-in, it was my I-dee-uh." Your sentence was slow, but correct. Rhonda seems furious, a creature, one inch tall who can not pronounce simple sentences, was telling her what to do! Rhonda grabbed you, you squirmed as she flicked you, that amount of pain was excruciating, she then started kicking Gladys, you bit Rhonda on the finger, she squealed as she dropped you, and ran off.

Luckily, you were caught by Gladys. She seemed content.

"Dusty, you shouldn't of bit Rhonda, but you did try to protect me, therefore I shall not punish you." This made you glad. Gladys grew you to 8 inches, examined you, poured some 'healing' products on any cut, then placed you, carefully back into the cage. You fell asleep a short time after Gladys. The next morning...
1522122111211221222221.title: Perfect Guardian, Hostile Roommate

choices: Do a little editing with your report.
Tell your master the whole truth.
15221221112112212222212.content:
You hear a tapping on your cage and that startles you awake. The fear that Rhonda may have come back to finish you off still lingers in your mind. Fortunately, it is the gentle face of Gladys that greats you in the early morning light. “Good morning Dusty, I hope that you are doing well,” said the capybara girl. Her voice sounded so sweet right about now, but you could not tell if she seemed so sweet because of how Iggy had acted the other day and how Rhonda had treated you yesterday. The important thing was that she was not trying to kill you and she actually had a small plate of food in her hands.
That plate looked like it had foods for something your size even though most of it was unfamiliar to you. It looked like Gladys was not the type to feed you human food just like Stella. “Since you had such a rough day yesterday I figured you deserve a little treat, but no more biting,” Gladys scolded. You shake your head in acknowledgment of her scolding and she places the little plate of food in your cage. It is still a little large for you, but that was only a good thing in your mind. There was no meat available and you guessed that was to avoid another incident with that ferret girl.
There was a wide assortment of fruits available to you. All of them looked good. Gladys may have been able to eat everything on the plate in one gulp, but it was a feast of tasty looking fruits to you. Each fruit was one nice juicy surprise after another and you dug into the plate with a good deal of enthusiasm. Gladys just smiled at you as you ate and made little noises that you had come to associate with the anthros when they think that you are doing something cute.
Gladys waited patiently for you to finish your breakfast before making sure that you received a morning cleaning. After that she just spent the morning cuddling with you and heaping a lot of attention on you. She really was a sweet girl and you wondered what would happen if you told your master about what Rhonda did to you. You would not want this sweet capybara to get in trouble because of someone else, especially because of someone like Rhonda. Gladys seemed to be doing a good job of making sure that you and Rhonda were never in the same room, but she still shouted out the occasional complaint about you.
“You better not have been feeding that little runt any of my food again Gladys,” Rhonda yelled from the kitchen.
“His name is Dusty and I only gave him some of my fruit so just calm down,” Gladys replied.
“I could care less what its name is as long as it doesn’t eat my food,” Rhonda yelled back. Things pretty much went on like that for the entire morning. Gladys was nice enough though. She even made sure you were close by as she prepared for school just in case Rhonda should take offense to your presence again. It made you happy when you heard the ferret depart and you had to wonder how such a bitter creature could live in the same place as a nice one like Gladys. When Gladys was finished getting ready she shrank you down to an inch in size and placed you back in your cage.
She made it to class with time to spare despite all that time she spent with you in the morning. When you were returned to Miss Vixen you could tell that Gladys was a little worried. She must have been thinking about what you would say happened with Rhonda. You were still wondering what you would have to say about Rhonda. That was one dangerous ferret and you were going to have to stay with her again so it might be a good idea to say something about her to your master. Then again, you really did not want Gladys to get into any trouble either.
15221221112112212222212.title: Sweet Gladys

choices: human feeding due to what I have heard
152212211121122122222122.content:
You had told the story and tried to make it that Gladys was very gentle and friendly with you, but she was overpowered by her room mate Rhonda, you had told her about meat. Your Master tutted at that part. You hoped that she didn't give Gladys a bad grade. You mentioned at the end on how you spoke to Gladys.

"Wow, you must have trusted her Dusty...anyway Rhonda was removed from last years class, she is a year above Gladys and I had always debated with the principal on whether Gladys should be with students of her own year." Your Master replied, stroking you during it. "Don't worry, the next two projects, I will order for Rhonda to stay in a different dorm so you're not hurt." You can remember the abandoned humans in the pound, they were all hurt and bruised and one had what looked like a foot mark on her, probably from people like Rhonda.

"Dusty, today we are going to do...
152212211121122122222122.title: Truth

1522122111211221222221221.content:
The students filed into class, Gladys nervous and shaking. Your master lovingly petted you before she began class, all the students were talking. It was too loud for you and you held your ears. Damn, teenagers are loud. After a minute or so, the noise died down and the whole classes attention was focused on the can of food on the table you're on. It was the human food can and it was open. You could smell the slop inside, the tasteless slop you're fed. It had a sweet smell, like it was filled with something sweet. You were taken out of your cage and placed next to the can, your master writing things on the board. You felt very nervous and bored.

"Okay class, Human feeding is an essential way to raise a Human. Humans can eat food like us, but only for special treats. Meats are not allowed in a Human's diet, they mess up their digestive systems and ruin their behaviour patterns. fruits are allowed in a Human's diet, but too many will make the Human hyperactive and edgy. Vegetables are allowed in a Human's diet, but only on special occasions, such as Christmas or Easter." You had never heard of 'Christmas' or 'Easter', at the pound, you were only fed bread and water and taught by the older Humans how to speak. The pound owners would never speak to you, not to any Human, only to the people who bought you. They didn't even say goodbye. You have never heard of 'Vegetables' either, maybe they were the ingredient to the human food. Your master kept on talking.

"Now, you should know never to feed a human fat foods or carbohydrates, except bread, they make the Human sick and fat. The only food you should be feeding a Human thrice a day is human food, it is safer for the Humans' systems. You see how behaved Dusty is, he has been fed on human food the past month I have had him." Your master had finished and was getting out some work sheets for the class. "These are just little tests to know your knowledge on a Human's dietary system. Oh, and remember this time next week, we will have a professional human handler in to teach you some tricks to teach humans." You wanted to learn tricks, but you didn't want to get them wrong and disappoint your master. The remaining fifty minutes of the lesson was silent and you felt uncomfortable sitting there, next to the food with incoherent scribbles on it the shapes were: h-u-m-a-n-f-o-o-d. You looked at the board, there it was written again. Then you remember your master saying 'human food' when she had written it down. Maybe that's what the scribbles meant. You tried reading around the class, a lot of the posters and artwork had h-u-m-a-n written on them then some more scribbles. You couldn't get your head around it before the bell rang.

You looked out at the class, leaving, gathering their stuff and scurrying out. Each of them muttering about the test. Your master was collecting all the papers. One student was still in their seat, staring at you staring, confused, at the posters. This student was...
